Key.Original: COMING SOON
Key.Chinese: 即將推出
Key.Chinesesimp: 即将推出

Key.Original: Open Strategic Map
Key.Chinese: 打開戰略地圖
Key.Chinesesimp: 打开战略地图

Key.Original:
CAMPAIGN INBOUND

The official campaign will be added in 3 Free DLC Episodes, available to everyone who owns Arma 3.

'Survive and adapt to unforgiving circumstances. Fight hard to win victory over a more powerful enemy.'

AVAILABLE FOR FREE

Each of the Campaign Episodes will be downloaded automatically via a Steam update once they become available.

For all the latest announcements on Arma 3's campaign and more, be sure to keep track of the in-game newsfeed, www.arma3.com, Facebook and Twitter!
Key.Chinese:
戰役即將推出

官方戰役將在未來分成3個免費的資料片供玩家下載，只要任何擁有武裝突襲3的玩家都可以獲得。

'在困境中求生存。並且跟強大的敵人對抗，運用戰術來獲得勝利。'

免費獲得

當Steam開放更新，每一個章節將會自動下載並安裝。

請持續追蹤武裝突襲3戰役的相關報導，你可以觀看遊戲中的新聞摘要，亦或查看www.arma3.com，Facebook和Twitter來持續追蹤!
Key.Chinesesimp:
战役即将推出

官方战役将在未来分成3个免费的资料片供玩家下载，只要任何拥有武装突袭3的玩家都可以获得。

'在困境中求生存。并且跟强大的敌人对抗，运用战术来获得胜利。'

免费获得

当Steam开放更新，每一个章节将会自动下载并安装。

请持续追踪武装突袭3战役的相关报导，你可以观看游戏中的新闻摘要，亦或查看www.arma3.com，Facebook和Twitter来持续追踪!

Key.Original: ESTIMATED DEPLOYMENT OF THE NEXT EPISODE
Key.Chinese: 下一次更新將在
Key.Chinesesimp: 下一次更新将在

Container.name: x05_I_Nonsense
Container.situation: player goes into a hazardous area

Key.Original: Dinosaurs are prohibited from riding the quad bikes.
Key.Chinese: 恐龍被禁止騎四輪摩托車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恐龙被禁止骑四轮摩托车。

Key.Original: Would David Armstrong please report to the general manager's office.
Key.Chinese: 請戴維·阿姆斯特朗先生到總經理辦公室報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请戴维·阿姆斯特朗先生到总经理办公室报到。

Key.Original: Remember, the expo will close early today for Charmaine's 28th birthday party.
Key.Chinese: 請記住，因為今天要為夏爾曼慶祝28歲的生日派對，所以展演活動將會提早結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请记住，因为今天要为夏尔曼庆祝28岁的生日派对，所以展演活动将会提早结束。

Container.name: x01_I_SafetyRegs
Container.situation: player goes into a hazardous area

Key.Original: Please respect expo regulations!
Key.Chinese: 請尊重展場規則!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请尊重展场规则!

Key.Original: Respect the safety rules!
Key.Chinese: 請遵守安全規章!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请遵守安全规章!

Key.Original: Demonstration on hold!
Key.Chinese: 展示暫停!
Key.Chinesesimp: 展示暂停!

Key.Original: Attendee in restricted area!
Key.Chinese: 參觀者在限制區!
Key.Chinesesimp: 参观者在限制区!

Container.name: 25_I_Auto
Container.situation: player visits the weapons area of the expo

Key.Original: The AR-2 Darter is a miniature remote-controlled quadrocopter designed for recon and surveillance roles.
Key.Chinese: AR-2"短刀"是一臺微型的遙控四軸飛行器，被設計用來做偵察與監視等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: AR-2"短刀"是一种微型的遥控四轴无人机，被设计用来做侦察与监视等任务。

Key.Original: The Stomper is a remote controlled unmanned ground vehicle designed for reconnaissance, surveillance and support.
Key.Chinese: "踐踏者"是一臺遙控的地面無人載具，被設計用來做偵察，監視或支援等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "践踏者"是一种遥控无人车，被设计用来做侦察，监视或支援等任务。

Key.Original: The MQ-4A Greyhawk is a combat-ready unmanned aerial vehicle equipped with air-to-ground missiles.
Key.Chinese: MQ-4A"灰鷹"是一臺武裝的無人偵察機，裝載著空對地飛彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: MQ-4A"灰鹰"是一架武装无人侦察机，装载着空地导弹。

Container.name: 20_I_Weapons
Container.situation: player visits the weapons area of the expo

Key.Original: The Mk32 GMG is a static grenade launcher that fires 20mm grenades.
Key.Chinese: Mk32 GMG是一臺固定式的榴彈發射器，發射20公厘榴彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: Mk32 GMG是一种固定式榴弹发射器，发射20mm 榴弹。

Key.Original: The Mk20 is a gas-operated, rotating-bolt, selective-fire weapon designed to be highly moddable.
Key.Chinese: Mk20是一把配被有氣動式，旋轉槍栓，可選開火模式，而且可以高度模組化的武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: Mk20是一种导气式，旋转枪栓闭锁，可选开火模式，而且可以高度模块化的武器。

Key.Original: The Mk200 is a gas-operated LMG that fires caseless belt-fed ammunition.
Key.Chinese: Mk200是一把氣動式輕機槍，使用無殼子彈的彈藥帶。
Key.Chinesesimp: Mk200是一种导气式轻机枪，使用无壳弹弹链供弹。

Container.name: 15_I_Water
Container.situation: player visits the naval area of the expo

Key.Original: The assault boat is a fast, lightweight, inflatable vessel used in a variety of roles.
Key.Chinese: 突擊艇擁有快速，輕量化，可充氣等特色，使他能在各種任務中扮演特殊角色。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击艇拥有快速，轻量化，可充气等特色，使他能在各种任务中扮演特殊角色。

Key.Original: The SDV is a manned submersible vehicle used to transport teams of divers over long distances underwater.
Key.Chinese: 海報運輸艇是一臺載人的潛水載具，用來讓潛水小隊在水下做長距離的移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 海豹运输艇是一种载人的潜水载具，用来让蛙人小组在水下做长距离移动。

Key.Original: The speed boat has a front-facing, remote controlled GMG turret, often sporting a rear-mounted minigun or HMG as well.
Key.Chinese: 快艇在前面有裝設一座搖控榴彈發射砲塔，在後面會設置"米尼岡"機槍或重機槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快艇有前向的榴弹机枪塔，在后面会设置转管机枪或重机枪。

Container.name: 10_I_Air
Container.situation: player visits the aerial area of the expo

Key.Original: The CH-49 Mohawk is a powerful transport helicopter with a large capacity.
Key.Chinese: CH-49"莫霍克"是一臺有著高乘載量的強大運輸直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: CH-49"莫霍克"是一种有着高乘载量的强大运输直升机。

Key.Original: The A-143 Buzzard is a single-seat multi-purpose combat aircraft able to deliver a variety of ordinance.
Key.Chinese: A-143"禿鷹"是一臺單座的多用途戰鬥機，被設計成可以裝載各種武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: A-143"秃鹰"是一种单座多用途战斗机，被设计成可以装载各种武器。

Container.name: 05_I_Ground
Container.situation: player visits the ground vehicles area of the expo

Key.Original: The Strider is a medium armored personnel carrier designed for recon and troop transport roles.
Key.Chinese: "挺進者"是一臺中型的裝甲運兵車，被設計用來做偵察與小隊運輸的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "挺进者"是一种中型装甲运兵车，被设计用来做侦察与部队运输的任务。

Key.Original: The AFV-4 Gorgon is an 8x8 APC armed with a 30mm cannon.
Key.Chinese: AFV-4"蛇髮女妖"是一臺8輪驅動的裝甲運兵車，配備著30公厘加農砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: AFV-4"蛇发女妖"是一种8轮驱动的装甲运兵车，配备着30mm 机炮。

Key.Original: The quad bike is an all-terrain vehicle used for recon and to access terrain heavier vehicles cannot traverse.
Key.Chinese: 四輪摩托車是一臺全地形載具，被用作偵察或是進入一般重型載具到不了的地形。
Key.Chinesesimp: 四轮摩托车是一台全地形载具，被用作侦察或是进入一般重型载具到不了的地形。

Container.name: 01_I_ExpoWelcome
Container.situation: player starts the expo, offered intyroduction

Key.Original: Welcome to the Altis Armed Forces expo.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎參加阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的軍武展示大會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欢迎参加阿尔蒂斯武装力量的开放日。

Key.Original: Drop by each expo zone and view the range of weapons, vehicles and aircraft on display.
Key.Chinese: 你可以參觀各個展區，像是靶場，車輛和飛機等等今天有展出的項目。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以参观各个展区，像是靶场，车辆和飞机等等今天有展出的项目。

Key.Original: Remember, a special demonstration of touch-and-go maneuvers is organized for today's exhibition.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，今天的展覽活動現場會有特別的飛機觸地重飛演習。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，今天的展览活动现场会有特别的飞机触地重飞演习。

Key.Chinese: 恐龍被禁止騎四輪摩托車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恐龙被禁止骑四轮摩托车。

Key.Original: Would David Armstrong please report to the general manager's office.
Key.Chinese: 請戴維·阿姆斯特朗先生到總經理辦公室報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请戴维·阿姆斯特朗先生到总经理办公室报到。

Key.Original: Remember, the expo will close early today for Charmaine's 28th birthday party.
Key.Chinese: 請記住，因為今天要為夏爾曼慶祝28歲的生日派對，所以展演活動將會提早結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请记住，因为今天要为夏尔曼庆祝28岁的生日派对，所以展演活动将会提早结束。

Key.Original: Attendee in restricted area!
Key.Chinese: 參觀者在限制區!
Key.Chinesesimp: 参观者在限制区!

Container.name: 25_B_Auto
Container.situation: player visits the weapons area of the expo

Key.Original: The AR-2 Darter is a miniature remote-controlled quadrocopter designed for recon and surveillance roles.
Key.Chinese: AR-2"短刀"是一臺微型的遙控四軸飛行器，被設計用來做偵察與監視等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: AR-2"短刀"是一种微型的遥控四轴无人机，被设计用来做侦察与监视等任务。

Key.Original: The Stomper is a remote controlled unmanned ground vehicle designed for reconnaissance, surveillance and support.
Key.Chinese: "踐踏者"是一臺遙控的地面無人載具，被設計用來做偵察，監視或支援等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "践踏者"是一种遥控无人车，被设计用来做侦察，监视或支援等任务。

Key.Original: The MQ-4A Greyhawk is a combat-ready unmanned aerial vehicle equipped with air-to-ground missiles.
Key.Chinese: MQ-4A"灰鷹"是一臺武裝的無人偵察機，裝載著空對地飛彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: MQ-4A"灰鹰"是一种武装无人侦察机，装载着空地导弹。

Key.Original: The MQ-12 Falcon is an autonomous, remotely-controlled helicopter drone primarily used for close air support.
Key.Chinese: MQ-12"獵隼"是臺自主式，遙控式的無人直升機，被設計來執行近距離火力支援任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: MQ-12"猎隼"是台自主式，遥控式的无人直升机，被设计来执行近距离火力支援任务。

Key.Original: The MQ-12 Falcon comes equipped with 2 rocket pods, each containing 12 unguided DAR rockets and 6 Skalpel ATGMs.
Key.Chinese: MQ-12"獵隼"配備著兩座火箭發射艙，各艙都有12枚無導引火箭彈，額外還有6枚"手術刀"空對地飛彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: MQ-12"猎隼"配备着两座火箭发射舱，各舱都有12枚无导引火箭弹，额外还有6枚"手术刀"空对地导弹。

Container.name: 20_B_Weapons
Container.situation: player visits the weapons area of the expo

Key.Original: The M320 Long Range Rifle is a .408 caliber sniper rifle developed in the US.
Key.Chinese: M320是一把配備.408口徑的狙擊槍，在美國開發完成。
Key.Chinesesimp: M320远程步枪是一把装填.408口径弹药的狙击步枪，在美国开发完成。

Key.Original: The MX is a 6.5mm assault rifle, standard issue for NATO forces.
Key.Chinese: MX突擊步槍配備著6.5公厘子彈，是北約部隊的標準配備。
Key.Chinesesimp: MX突击步枪配备着6.5mm 子弹，是北约部队的标准配备。

Key.Original: The Special Purpose Assault Rifle series, NATO's newest, high-tech primary weapon system. 7.62mm and 5.56mm caliber variants, combined with an optional grenade launcher, make the series a fan favorite among special operations groups.
Key.Chinese: 北約的新型高科技特殊用途突擊步槍系列，有著7.62公厘與5.56公厘兩種口徑，可以再選配榴彈發射器來配合不同的任務，使這把武器深獲特種部隊的青睞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约新式的高科技特殊用途突击步枪系列，有着7.62mm 与5.56mm 两种口径，可以再选配榴弹发射器来配合不同的任务，使这把武器深获特种部队的青睐。

Container.name: 15_B_Water
Container.situation: player visits the naval area of the expo

Key.Original: The assault boat is a fast, lightweight, inflatable vessel used in a variety of roles.
Key.Chinese: 突擊艇擁有快速，輕量化，可充氣等特色，使他能在各種任務中扮演特殊角色。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击艇拥有快速，轻量化，可充气等特色，使他能在各种任务中扮演特殊角色。

Key.Original: The SDV is a manned submersible vehicle used to transport teams of divers over long distances underwater.
Key.Chinese: 海豹運輸艇是一臺載人的潛水載具，用來讓潛水小隊在水下做長距離的移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 海豹运输艇是一种载人潜水艇，用来让蛙人小组在水下做长距离移动。

Key.Original: The speed boat has a front-facing, remote controlled GMG turret, often sporting a rear-mounted minigun or HMG as well.
Key.Chinese: 快艇在前面有裝設一座搖控榴彈發射砲塔，在後面會設置"米尼岡"機槍或重機槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快艇有前向的榴弹机枪塔，在后面会设置转管机枪或重机枪。

Container.name: 10_B_Air
Container.situation: player visits the aerial area of the expo

Key.Original: The UH-80 Ghost Hawk is a medium-lift multi-role helicopter originally developed for special operations.
Key.Chinese: UH-80"鬼鷹"是一臺多用途的中型運輸直升機，被開發來用在特種作戰上。
Key.Chinesesimp: UH-80"幽灵鹰"是一种多用途中型运输直升机，用于特种作战。

Key.Original: The MH-9 Hummingbird is a light, agile single-engine helicopter.
Key.Chinese: MH-9"蜂鳥"是一臺輕型與靈活的單引擎直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: MH-9"蜂鸟"是一种轻型且灵活的单发直升机。

Key.Original: The AH-9 Pawnee is an armed variant of the MH-9 Hummingbird, with DAR unguided rocket pods and two 7.62mm miniguns.
Key.Chinese: AH-9"波尼"是MH-9"蜂鳥"武裝過後的版本，配備有DAR非制導火箭莢艙與兩個7.62公厘"米尼岡"機槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: AH-9"波尼"是MH-9"蜂鸟"的武装版本，配备有DAR非制导火箭巢与两挺7.62mm 转管机枪。

Key.Original: The V-44 X Blackfish is a rotor-based, Vertical Take-off and Landing capable airframe that comes in 3 standard-issue configurations.
Key.Chinese: V-44X"黑魚"是臺可以垂直起降的旋翼式飛機，此機有三種不同裝備配置的版本。
Key.Chinesesimp: V-44X"黑鱼"是台可以垂直起降的旋翼式飞机，此机有三种不同装备配置的版本。

Key.Original: The V-44 X Blackfish is able to serve as an unarmed infantry or vehicle transport aircraft, allowing it to deploy cargo in areas otherwise inaccessible to other rotary or fixed-wing aircrafts.
Key.Chinese: V-44X"黑魚"無武裝的兩個版本分別可以運輸步兵或是載具，他可以把貨物運送到一般直升機或是固定翼飛機難以抵達的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: V-44X"黑鱼"无武装的两个版本分别可以运输步兵或是载具，他可以把货物运送到一般直升机或是固定翼飞机难以抵达的地方。

Key.Original: The V-44 X Blackfish, the armed variant, is capable of serving in both offensive and defensive roles, sporting a 40mm cannon, 105mm cannon and 20mm Minigun equipped with high explosive ammunition.
Key.Chinese: 武裝版本的V-44X"黑魚"配備著40公厘，105公厘火炮以及使用高爆彈藥的20公厘"米尼岡"機槍，使其能有效擔任進攻或是防禦的角色。
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装版本的V-44X"黑鱼"配备着40mm、105mm 火炮以及使用高爆弹药的20mm 转管机炮，使其能有效担任进攻或是防御的角色。

Container.name: 05_B_Ground
Container.situation: player visits the ground vehicles area of the expo

Key.Original: The Scorcher M4 is a 155mm self-propelled gun with an advanced artillery computer.
Key.Chinese: "炙烤者"M4是一臺配備有155公厘口徑大砲與先進射控電腦的自走砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: "炙烤者"M4是一台配备先进火控计算机的155mm 自行火炮。

Key.Original: The M2A1 Slammer is a main battle tank armed with a 120mm cannon.
Key.Chinese: M2A1"重擊者"是一臺配備120公厘加農砲的主戰坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: M2A1"重击者"是一种配备120mm 坦克炮的主战坦克。

Key.Original: The Panther is an armored personnel carrier armed with a 12.7mm machine gun, 40mm grenade launcher, and a cargo capacity for up to eight soldiers.
Key.Chinese: "黑豹"是一臺裝甲運兵車，配備有12.7公厘機槍，40公厘榴彈發射器，可以乘載8名人員的空間。
Key.Chinesesimp: "黑豹"是一种装甲运兵车，配备有12.7mm 机枪，40mm 榴弹发射器，可容纳8名载员。

Key.Original: The Prowler is NATO's standard-issue Light Strike Vehicle used by special operation groups, with its advantages over other vehicles being its small profile and high mobility.
Key.Chinese: "徘徊者"是一臺給北約特種部隊使用的輕型突擊車，與其載具相比，他有著較嬌小的尺寸與良好的機動性等優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "徘徊者"是一台给北约特种部队使用的轻型突击车，与其载具相比，他有着较娇小的尺寸与良好的机动性等优势。

Key.Original: The armed variant of the Prowler is equipped with both .50 cal and .338 caliber machinegun turrets.
Key.Chinese: 武裝版本的"徘徊者"裝備著兩挺.50與.338口徑的機槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装版本的"徘徊者"装备着两挺.50与.338口径的机枪。

Container.name: 01_B_ExpoWelcome
Container.situation: player starts the expo, offered introduction

Key.Original: Welcome to the NATO military expo.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎參加北約軍武展示大會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欢迎参加北约部队的开放日。

Key.Original: Visit each expo area to experience the range of weapons, vehicles and aircraft on display today.
Key.Chinese: 參觀每個展覽區今天有展出的武器，車輛與飛機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 参观每个展览区今天有展出的武器，车辆与飞机。

Key.Original: Don't forget to drop by the special live fire exhibition, which features a variety of powerful vehicles.
Key.Chinese: 千萬別錯過今天的實彈射擊演習，那裡有著我們最強大的載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 千万别错过今天的实弹射击演习，那里有着我们最强大的载具。

Container.name: x01_O_SafetyRegs
Container.situation: player goes into a hazardous area

Key.Original: Please respect expo regulations!
Key.Chinese: 請遵守展場規則!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请遵守展场规则!

Key.Original: Abide by the safety rules!
Key.Chinese: 請遵守安全規章!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请遵守安全规章!

Key.Original: Demonstration on hold!
Key.Chinese: 展示暫停!
Key.Chinesesimp: 展示暂停!

Key.Original: Attendee in restricted area!
Key.Chinese: 參觀者在限制區!
Key.Chinesesimp: 参观者在限制区!

Container.name: 25_O_Auto
Container.situation: player visits the weapons area of the expo

Key.Original: The Tayran AR-2 is a miniature remote-controlled quadrocopter designed for recon and surveillance roles.
Key.Chinese: "泰蘭"AR-2是一臺微型的遙控四軸飛行器，被設計用來做偵察與監視等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "泰兰"AR-2是一台微型的遥控四轴无人机，被设计用来做侦察与监视等任务。

Key.Original: The Saif is a remote controlled unmanned ground vehicle designed for reconnaissance, surveillance and support.
Key.Chinese: "薩夫"是一臺遙控的地面無人載具，被設計用來做偵察，監視或支援等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "萨夫"是一种遥控无人车，被设计用来做侦察，监视或支援等任务。

Key.Original: The K40 Adabil-3 is a combat-ready unmanned aerial vehicle equipped with air-to-ground missiles.
Key.Chinese: K40"燕子"-3是一臺武裝的空中無人載具，裝載著空對地飛彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: K40"燕子"-3是一种武装无人机，装载着空地导弹。

Key.Original: The KH-3A Fenghuang is a Chinese autonomous, remote-controlled drone used primarily for close air support and recon.
Key.Chinese: KH-3A"鳳凰"是臺中國製的自主式，遙控式無人飛機，被設計來執行近距離火力支援與偵察等任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: KH-3A"凤凰"是台中国制的自主式，遥控式无人飞机，被设计来执行近距离火力支援与侦察等任务。

Key.Original: It is equipped with 4 air-to-surface missiles along with a standard-issue laser designator.
Key.Chinese: 它配備著4枚空對地飛彈與雷射指示器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它配备4枚空地导弹和激光指示器。

Container.name: 20_O_Weapons
Container.situation: player visits the weapons area of the expo

Key.Original: The Gepard GM6 Lynx is a semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle with advanced barrel recoil technology.
Key.Chinese: "傑帕德"GM6"山貓"是一把半自動反物質步槍，配備先進的槍管後座力技術。
Key.Chinesesimp: "杰帕德"GM6"山猫"是一把半自动反器材步枪，采用先进的枪管后座力技术。

Key.Original: The Katiba is a 6.5mm bullpup assault rifle known for its reliability and low recoil.
Key.Chinese: "卡提巴"是一把有著6.5公厘子彈的無托突擊步槍，它因它的可靠性與低後座力而聞名。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡提巴"是一把装填6.5mm 子弹的无托突击步枪，因其可靠性与低后座力而闻名。

Key.Original: The CAR rifle series. Capable of a firerate of 800 rounds per minute, the CAR has recently seen deployment among CSAT forces in the Pacific.
Key.Chinese: CAR步槍系列的射速最高可達每分鐘800發，最近開始廣泛的裝備在廣協同盟的太平洋部隊中。
Key.Chinesesimp: CAR步枪系列的射速最高可达每分钟800发，最近开始广泛的装备在广协同盟的太平洋部队中。

Key.Original: The CMR-76 is the preferred designated marksman rifle of CSAT's Pacific contingent. It is a gas operated, semi-automatic rifle of bullpup configuration.
Key.Chinese: CMR-76是一把指定精準射手步槍，被配給於廣協同盟的太平洋部隊中。其架構使用氣體傳動機構與無托構造來組成一把半自動步槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: CMR-76是一把指定精准射手步枪，被配给于广协同盟的太平洋部队中。其架构使用气体传动机构与无托构造来组成一把半自动步枪。

Container.name: 15_O_Water
Container.situation: player visits the naval area of the expo

Key.Original: The assault boat is a fast, lightweight, inflatable vessel used in a variety of roles.
Key.Chinese: 突擊艇擁有快速，輕量化，可充氣等特色，使他能在各種任務中扮演特殊角色。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突击艇拥有快速，轻量化，可充气等特色，使他能在各种任务中扮演特殊角色。

Key.Original: The SDV is a manned submersible vehicle used to transport diver teams over long distances underwater.
Key.Chinese: 海豹運輸艇是一臺載人的潛水載具，用來讓潛水小隊在水下做長距離的移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 海豹运输艇是一台载人的潜水载具，用来让蛙人小组在水下做长距离的移动。

Key.Original: The speed boat has a front-facing, remote controlled GMG turret, often sporting a rear-mounted minigun or HMG as well.
Key.Chinese: 快艇在前面有裝設一座搖控榴彈發射砲塔，在後面會設置"米尼岡"機槍或重機槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快艇有前向的榴弹机枪塔，在后面会设置转管机枪或重机枪。

Container.name: 10_O_Air
Container.situation: player visits the aerial area of the expo

Key.Original: The PO-30 Orca is a transport and utility helicopter, originally intended to replace the Mi-8.
Key.Chinese: PO-3"逆戟鯨"是一臺多功能運輸直升機，原本計劃用來取代米-8。
Key.Chinesesimp: PO-30"逆戟鲸"是一台多功能运输直升机，原本计划用来取代米-8。

Key.Original: The Mi-48 is a large helicopter gunship with a cargo capacity of up to eight people.
Key.Chinese: 米-48是一臺大型的武裝直升機，其擁有可以乘載8人的後艙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米-48是一种大型武装直升机，拥有可以乘载8人的后舱。

Key.Original: The Y-32 Xi'an is a hybrid Vertical Take-off and Landing capable aircraft designed to operate under difficult conditions.
Key.Chinese: Y-32"西安"是臺能垂直起降的飛機，被設計在各種危險的環境下仍能順利的執行任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: Y-32"西安"是一种混合式垂直起降的飞机，在各种复杂环境下仍能顺利执行任务。

Key.Original: The Y-32 Xi'an comes in 2 primary configurations: infantry and vehicle transport, respectively.
Key.Chinese: Y-32"西安"在設計上分為兩種版本:步兵運輸版，載具運輸版。
Key.Chinesesimp: Y-32"西安"在设计上分为两种版本:步兵运输版，载具运输版。

Key.Original: Both configurations of the Y-32 Xi'an are equipped with a 30mm cannon, Skyfire rockets, and Skalpel missiles.
Key.Chinese: 兩種版本的Y-32"西安"均配備著30公厘機砲，"天火"火箭彈與"手術刀"反坦克飛彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 两种版本的Y-32"西安"均配备着30mm 机炮，"天火"火箭弹与"手术刀"反坦克导弹。

Container.name: 05_O_Ground
Container.situation: player visits the ground vehicles area of the expo

Key.Original: The MSE-3 Marid is a maneuverable, amphibious 6-wheeled APC.
Key.Chinese: MSE-3"馬里德"是一臺具有高機動性，與兩棲作戰能力的6輪裝甲運兵車。
Key.Chinesesimp: MSE-3"马里德"是一台具有高机动性与两栖作战能力的6轮装甲运兵车。

Key.Original: The Ifrit is a Mine Resistant Ambush Protected vehicle designed and manufactured in Russia.
Key.Chinese: "焰靈"是一臺防地雷反伏擊車，在俄羅斯設計與製造。
Key.Chinesesimp: "焰灵"是一种防地雷反伏击车，由俄罗斯设计制造。

Key.Original: The T100 Varsuk main battle tank is equipped with a standard 125mm canon.
Key.Chinese: T100"獾"是一臺配備125公厘加農砲的主戰坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: T100"獾"是一辆配备125mm 坦克炮的主战坦克。

Key.Original: The Qilin is a Light Strike Vehicle used by special operation groups. Its advantage lies in its small profile and high mobility.
Key.Chinese: "麒麟"是臺給特種部隊使用的輕型突擊載具。他的優點在於其小巧的尺寸與傑出的機動性。
Key.Chinesesimp: "麒麟"是给特种部队使用的轻型突击载具。其优点在于小巧的尺寸与杰出的机动性。

Key.Original: The armed variant of Qilin LSV provides space for 7 soldiers and comes equipped with a 6.5mm Minigun.
Key.Chinese: 武裝版本的"麒麟"可以運送7名士兵，並配有一挺6.5公厘"米尼岡"機槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装版本的"麒麟"可以运送7名士兵，并配有一挺6.5mm 转管机枪。

Container.name: 01_O_ExpoWelcome
Container.situation: player starts the expo, offered introduction

Key.Original: Thank you for attending the CSAT military expo.
Key.Chinese: 感謝你來參加廣協同盟軍武展示大會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢你来参加广协同盟部队开放日。

Key.Original: Each expo area showcases a variety of weapons, vehicles and aircraft.
Key.Chinese: 每個展覽區各自展示不同的武器，車輛與飛機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个展览区各自展示不同的武器，车辆与飞机。

Key.Original: Visit the firing range and witness a demonstration of powerful infantry weapons.
Key.Chinese: 你可以參觀靶場並親眼見證強大的步兵武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以参观靶场并亲眼见证强大的步兵武器。

Container.name: x15_ReconDead
Container.participants: RC O Viper Green;RC O HQ;RC O Pilot;
Container.situation: recon team gets killed.

Key.Original: Griffin, this is Viper-Green! They have broken through our defenses! We can't hold out much longer!
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"毒蛇-綠"!他們打破了我們的防線!我們沒法再多守住一會兒了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"毒蛇-绿"!他们打破了我们的防御!我们没法再守下去了!

Key.Original: Viper-Green? Viper-Green, this is Griffin. Do you copy?
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-綠"?"毒蛇-綠"，這裡是"獅鷲"。是否收到?
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-绿"?"毒蛇-绿"，这里是"狮鹫"。是否收到?

Key.Original: Hydra, we have lost communications with Viper-Green, presumed KIA. Return to Pyrgos immediately. Over.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，我們已經與"毒蛇-綠"失去聯繫，可能已經全員陣亡。請立即返回皮爾戈斯。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，我们已经与"毒蛇-绿"失去联系，推定全员阵亡。请立即返回皮尔戈斯。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger, Griffin. Adjusting course now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"獅鷲"。調整航線中。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"狮鹫"。调整航线中。通话完毕。

Container.name: x10_ShotDown
Container.situation: player's helicopter was shot down.

Key.Original: Copy that, Hydra, we have your location. Dispatching rescue team. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"九頭蛇"，我們有你的位置。派遣搜救隊中。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"九头蛇"，我们有你的位置。派遣搜救队中。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Mayday! Mayday! Hydra is going down!
Key.Chinese: 求救!求救!"九頭蛇"正在往下掉!
Key.Chinesesimp: 求救!求救!"九头蛇"正在坠落!

Container.name: x01_PyrgosLost
Container.situation: pyrgos was overrun.

Key.Original: Griffin to all units, Pyrgos is lost. Our forces are pulling out.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"致所有單位，皮爾戈斯已淪陷。我們的部隊正往後撤。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"致所有单位，皮尔戈斯已沦陷。我们的部队正往后撤。

Key.Original: Fall back to your defensive positions. Await further orders. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 撤退至你們的防守位置。並等待更進一步的命令。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退至你们的防御位置。并等待更进一步的命令。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Container.name: 50_ReconSaved
Container.situation: player successfully extracted viper.

Key.Original: Great work, Hydra. We will have a medical team standing by at the helipad. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，"九頭蛇"。我們將會有一支醫療團隊在直升機停機坪旁待命。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，"九头蛇"。我们将会有一支医疗团队在直升机停机坪旁待命。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin, this is Hydra. Viper-Green secured. Returning to base. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"九頭蛇"。"毒蛇-綠"已安全。返回基地中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"九头蛇"。"毒蛇-绿"已安全。返回基地中。完毕。

Container.name: 40_ReconDistressCall
Container.participants: RC O Viper Green;RC O HQ;RC O Pilot;
Container.situation: recon team calls for help.

Key.Original: Viper-Green to Griffin! Viper-Green to Griffin! Do you copy?!
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-綠"呼叫"獅鷲"!"毒蛇-綠"呼叫"獅鷲"!是否收到?!
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-绿"呼叫"狮鹫"!"毒蛇-绿"呼叫"狮鹫"!是否收到?!

Key.Original: We have been compromised! I say again, we have been compromised! Requesting immediate assistance! Over!
Key.Chinese: 我們被壓制了!我重複一次，我們被壓制了!請求立即的支援!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们被压制了!我重复一次，我们被压制了!请求立即支援!完毕!

Key.Original: We hear you, Viper-Green. Go ahead. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們聽到了，"毒蛇-綠"。請繼續說。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们听到了，"毒蛇-绿"。请继续说。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, Viper-Green. Hydra, you are the only one I have on hand. Divert to extract Viper-Green. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"毒蛇-綠"。"九頭蛇"，你是我手中唯一擁有的資源。快過去幫忙撤離"毒蛇-綠"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"毒蛇-绿"。"九头蛇"，你是我手中唯一拥有的资源。快去帮"毒蛇-绿"撤离。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that, Griffin, changing course now. Hydra out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"獅鷲"。更改航線中。"九頭蛇"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"狮鹫"。更改航线中。"九头蛇"通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_NewTasks
Container.situation: griffin assigns the player two new tasks.

Key.Original: Hydra, proceed west into enemy territory. You have two objectives.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，向西移動到敵軍的領土。你在那裡有兩個目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，向西移动到敌军的领土。你在那里有两个目标。

Key.Original: The first is the enemy naval base on the coastline opposite Pyrgos.
Key.Chinese: 第一個目標是在皮爾戈斯對面海岸線上的海軍基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第一个目标是在皮尔戈斯对面海岸线上的海军基地。

Key.Original: Second objective: search and destroy enemy artillery platforms bombarding our forces in Pyrgos.
Key.Chinese: 第二個目標:搜索並摧毀敵軍正在轟炸皮爾戈斯的火砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第二个目标:搜索并摧毁敌军正在炮击皮尔戈斯的火炮。

Key.Original: Is that clear, Hydra? Over.
Key.Chinese: 都清楚嗎，"九頭蛇"?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 都清楚吗，"九头蛇"?完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that, Griffin. All clear. Proceeding to first objective. Hydra out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"獅鷲"。都很清楚。開始向第一個目標進發。"九頭蛇"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"狮鹫"。都很清楚。开始向第一个目标进发。"九头蛇"通话完毕。

Container.name: 15_PyrgosDefended
Container.situation: griffin informs the player that pyrgos is secure.

Key.Original: Griffin to Hydra, Pyrgos reports enemy forces are in retreat.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"致"九頭蛇"，皮爾戈斯回報敵軍已開始撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"致"九头蛇"，皮尔戈斯报告称敌军已开始撤退。

Key.Original: We have another job for you. Stand by for tasking, Hydra. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們有其他的工作要給你。請等待任務派發，"九頭蛇"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们有其他的工作要给你。请等待任务派发，"九头蛇"。完毕。

Key.Original: Standing by, Griffin.
Key.Chinese: 待命中，"獅鷲"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 待命中，"狮鹫"。

Container.name: 05_InTheAir
Container.situation: player reports that he's airborne and en route.

Key.Original: Good to hear, Hydra. Pyrgos is reporting an imminent amphibious assault. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 真高興聽見這消息，"九頭蛇"。皮爾戈斯回報現在已經快要發生兩棲登陸戰了。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴听见这消息，"九头蛇"。皮尔戈斯报告称敌两栖突击即将开始。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin, this is Hydra. We are airborne. Proceeding to objective. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"九頭蛇"。我們升空了。正前往目標當中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"九头蛇"。我们升空了。正赶往目标。完毕。

Container.name: 01_Prologue
Container.situation: hydra riding to the airfield in a truck.

Key.Original: Griffin to Hydra, what is your status? Over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"致"九頭蛇"，你的狀況怎樣?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"致"九头蛇"，你的状况怎样?完毕。

Key.Original: We've retaken the capital but enemy forces have launched a counter-offensive.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經重新佔領了首都，但敵人也發動了反擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经重新占领了首都，但敌人也发动了反击。

Key.Original: We need you in the air to reinforce our defense. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 我們需要你進入該領空並援助守軍。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要你进入该领空并援助守军。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Approaching the airfield now, Griffin, what is the situation at Pyrgos?
Key.Chinese: 正在靠近機場中，"獅鷲"，現在皮爾戈斯的狀況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在靠近机场中，"狮鹫"，现在皮尔戈斯的状况如何?

Container.name: x25_ReconDead_Backup
Container.participants: RC O Viper Green;RC O HQ;RC O Pilot;
Container.situation: viper is dead. god job, idiot.

Key.Original: Viper-Green? Viper-Green, this is Griffin. Do you copy?
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-綠"?"毒蛇-綠"，這裡是"獅鷲"。是否收到?
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-绿"?"毒蛇-绿"，这里是"狮鹫"。是否收到?

Key.Original: Hydra, we have lost communication with Viper-Green, presumed KIA. Return to Pyrgos immediately. Over.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，我們已經與"毒蛇-綠"失去聯繫，可能已經全員陣亡。請立即返回皮爾戈斯。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，我们已经与"毒蛇-绿"失去联系，推定全员阵亡。请立即返回皮尔戈斯。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger, Griffin. Adjusting course now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"獅鷲"。調整航線中。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"狮鹫"。调整航线中。通话完毕。

Container.name: x20_ReconDistressCall_Backup
Container.situation: base informs player about viper green in trouble

Key.Original: Hydra, urgent message: one of our special operations teams is pinned down and requires immediate assistance.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，緊急訊息:我們其中一支特種部隊正被壓制中，他們已經請求了立即支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，紧急信息:我们其中一支特种部队正被压制，他们请求立即支援。

Key.Original: You are the only one I have on hand. Divert to extract Viper-Green. Over.
Key.Chinese: 你是我手中唯一擁有的資源。快過去幫忙撤離"毒蛇-綠"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是我手中唯一拥有的资源。快去帮"毒蛇-绿"撤离。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that, Griffin. Changing course now. Hydra out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"獅鷲"。更改航線中。"九頭蛇"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"狮鹫"。更改航线中。"九头蛇"通话完毕。

Container.name: x05_OutOfAmmo
Container.situation: player asks for a rearm.

Key.Original: Our forces in Pyrgos should be able to help you, Hydra. Land there and they will take care of it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們在皮爾戈斯的部隊應該能幫助你，"九頭蛇"。降落在那邊然後他們就會給你彈藥了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在皮尔戈斯的部队应该能帮助你，"九头蛇"。降落在那边然后他们就会给你支援。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Hydra to Griffin, we're running low on ammo out here. Is there anywhere for us to rearm? Over.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"致"獅鷲"，我們這裡彈藥快耗盡了。有哪一個地方可以給我們進行補給嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"致"狮鹫"，我们这里弹药快耗尽了。有什么地方可以给我们进行补给吗?完毕。

Container.name: 45_AllIn
Container.situation: viper tells the player they're all in.

Key.Original: We're all aboard! Go!
Key.Chinese: 我們都上機了!快走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们都上来了!快走!

Container.name: 35_ObjectivesCompleted
Container.situation: player informs griffin that all objectives have been met.

Key.Original: Hydra to Griffin, all objectives complete. Adjusting course back to Pyrgos, over.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"致"獅鷲"，所有目標皆已完成。將調整航線返回皮爾戈斯，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"致"狮鹫"，所有目标皆已完成。将调整航线返回皮尔戈斯，完毕。

Container.name: 30_SPGsDestroyed
Container.situation: player destroyed the artillery platforms.

Key.Original: Roger. Good work, Hydra. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。幹的好，"九頭蛇"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。干的好，"九头蛇"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Hydra to Griffin, all artillery platforms destroyed. Proceeding with the mission plan, over.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"致"獅鷲"，所有火砲皆已摧毀。繼續照著任務計劃進行，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"致"狮鹫"，所有火炮都被摧毁。继续按任务计划进行，完毕。

Container.name: 25_NavalBaseDestroyed
Container.situation: player destroyed the naval base.

Key.Original: Roger that, Hydra. Keep us posted. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"九頭蛇"。保持聯繫。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"九头蛇"。保持联系。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin, be advised, we have neutralized the enemy naval base. Continuing to the next objective, over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，請注意，我們已經殲滅了敵軍的海軍基地。往下一個目標前進，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，请注意，我们已经歼灭了敌军的海军基地。往下一个目标前进，完毕。

Container.name: 10_Contact
Container.situation: first contact with the enemy.

Key.Original: We have several enemy contacts on radar. Prepare to engage.
Key.Chinese: 我們有多起敵軍雷達回報。準備好接戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们发现多个敌军雷达接触。准备接战。

Container.name: x10_DronesDestroyed
Container.participants: RC B Fox;RC B Rook;RC B Bishop;
Container.situation: fox comments on the stomper being destroyed.

Key.Original: Rook, be advised, we just lost the last drone. Over.
Key.Chinese: "白嘴鴉"，請注意，我們剛失去了最後一架無人載具。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "白嘴鸦"，请注意，我们刚失去了最后一架无人机。完毕。

Key.Original: Shit. Ok, Fox, wait one.
Key.Chinese: 該死。Ok，"狐狸"，請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好，"狐狸"，请稍等。

Key.Original: Bishop, do you copy? Both drones are out of action. Orders?
Key.Chinese: "主教"，是否收到?兩架無人載具皆已損壞。命令?
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，是否收到?两台无人载具皆已损坏。命令?

Key.Original: That's a problem, Rook. This fuck up isn't exactly part of the plan.
Key.Chinese: 這真是個問題，"白嘴鴉"。這他媽的不該是計劃中的一部分。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这真是个问题，"白嘴鸦"。这他妈的不该是计划中的一部分。

Key.Original: Fox - unless you can find a way to salvage this mess - fall back to Rook's position. Out.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"-除非你能找到方法來挽救這個爛攤子-不然就直接撤回"白嘴鴉"的位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"-除非你能找到方法来挽救这个烂摊子-不然就直接撤回"白嘴鸦"的位置。通话完毕。

Container.name: x30_NoMates
Container.situation: bishop informs fox that they're out of time and the assault has been called off.

Key.Original: They're - I took a different route. It was my call.
Key.Chinese: 他們-我挑了一個不一樣的路線。這都是我的錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们-我挑了一个不一样的路线。这都是我的错。

Key.Original: Wait, what, only you? Where's your team - where's the rest of the guys?
Key.Chinese: 等，等一下，只有你?你的小隊去哪了-你們剩下的人呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等，等一下，只有你?你的小组去哪了-你们剩下的人呢?

Key.Original: That was not part of the plan, Fox. For fuck's sake.
Key.Chinese: 這並不是計劃中的一部分，"狐狸"。看在老天的分上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这并不是计划中的一部分，"狐狸"。看在老天的分上。

Key.Original: Bishop, this is Rook. We've got a problem. Fox thought he'd get smart.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，這裡是"白嘴鴉"。我們有一些麻煩了。"狐狸"自以為他很聰明。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，这里是"白嘴鸦"。我们有一些麻烦了。"狐狸"自以为他很聪明。

Key.Original: We're going to be late to the exfil. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們將會慢一點抵達撤離點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将会慢一点抵达撤离点。通话完毕。

Container.name: x25_OutOfTime
Container.situation: bishop informs fox that they're out of time and the assault has been called off.

Key.Original: Rook, Fox, this is Bishop. We've got to pull you out. Operation scrubbed.
Key.Chinese: "白嘴鴉"，"狐狸"，這裡是"主教"。我們必須把你們撤回來了。任務取消。
Key.Chinesesimp: "白嘴鸦"，"狐狸"，这里是"主教"。我们必须把你们撤回来了。任务取消。

Key.Original: Fall back to the RV and proceed to exfil. Now or never, gentlemen. Out.
Key.Chinese: 撤回會合點後向撤退點前進。現在馬上行動，先生們。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤回会合点后向撤退点前进。现在马上行动，先生们。通话完毕。

Container.name: x20_OutOfTimeWarning
Container.participants: RC B Rook;RC B Fox;RC B Bishop;
Container.situation: bishop informs fox that they're out of time and the assault has been called off.

Key.Original: Negative, Rook. We're still in progress. Over.
Key.Chinese: 否定，"白嘴鴉"。我們還在進行當中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，"白嘴鸦"。我们还在进行当中。完毕。

Key.Original: Fox, what's the situation? Any update? Over.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，狀況如何?有任何消息嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，状况如何?有任何消息吗?完毕。

Key.Original: Expedite. Operation is time critical. Out.
Key.Chinese: 快一點。這個任務時間就是關鍵。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快一点。这一行动最关键的就是时间。通话完毕。

Container.name: x15_HVTLeft
Container.situation: bishop informs bishop that the enemy commander escaped.

Key.Original: Fox, update, Pegasus has left your operational area. Objective cancelled. Out.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，狀況更新，"飛馬"已經離開了你們的任務區域。目標取消。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，状况更新，"飞马"已经离开了你们的任务区域。目标取消。通话完毕。

Container.name: x05_UGVDestroyed
Container.situation: fox comments on the stomper being destroyed.

Key.Original: Rook, be advised, we just lost the UGV. Over.
Key.Chinese: "白嘴鴉"，請注意，我們剛失去我們的地面無人載具。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "白嘴鸦"，请注意，我们刚失去我们的无人车。完毕。

Key.Original: Shit ... Alright, understood. Be careful. Continue with the operation. Get it done, Fox. Out.
Key.Chinese: 該死...好吧，了解了。請小心。繼續你們的任務。把它搞定，"狐狸"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...好吧，了解了。请小心。继续你们的任务。把它搞定，"狐狸"。通话完毕。

Container.name: x01_UAVDestroyed
Container.situation: fox comments on the skylark being destroyed.

Key.Original: Rook, be advised, we just lost the bird. Over.
Key.Chinese: "白嘴鴉"，請注意，我們剛失去我們的飛行器。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "白嘴鸦"，请注意，我们刚损失了我们的无人机。完毕。

Key.Original: Shit ... Alright, understood. Be careful. Continue with the operation. Get it done, Fox. Out.
Key.Chinese: 該死...好吧，了解了。請小心。繼續你們的任務。把它搞定，"狐狸"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...好吧，了解了。请小心。继续你们的任务。把它搞定，"狐狸"。通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_ExfilRV
Container.situation: bishop orders fox to exfil and other squads to engage.

Key.Original: Alright, move it. Get in the vehicle.
Key.Chinese: 好的，快移動。進入載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，快移动。上车。

Key.Original: Bishop, this is Rook, Fox is at the RV. Moving out now.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，這裡是"白嘴鴉"，"狐狸"已經在我們這邊了。開始進行撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，这里是"白嘴鸦"，"狐狸"已经在我们这边了。开始进行撤离。

Key.Original: Understood. All teams, proceed to exfil. Let's get out of here.
Key.Chinese: 了解。所有小隊，開始前往撤退點。讓我們離開這個地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。各组都有，开始前往撤离点。让我们离开这个地方。

Container.name: 25_ExfilNotification
Container.situation: bishop orders fox to exfil and other squads to engage.

Key.Original: Rook, be advised, approaching your position. Eyes open, finger off the trigger. Over.
Key.Chinese: "白嘴鴉"，請注意，正在接近你們位置中。注意一點，手指請離開板機。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "白嘴鸦"，请注意，正在接近你们位置中。眼睛睁大，手指离开板机。完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Fox. Just get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"狐狸"。直接過來就是了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"狐狸"。直接过来就是了。

Container.name: 20_AADestroyed
Container.situation: fox reports to bishop that both aa sites have been neutralized.

Key.Original: Bishop, this is Fox. Be advised, both enemy AA sites neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，這裡是"狐狸"。請注意，全部的防空陣地皆已殲滅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，这里是"狐狸"。请注意，两处防空阵地都已歼灭。完毕。

Key.Original: Outstanding. RV with Rook and move to the exfil point. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好。與"白嘴鴉"會合後往撤離點移動。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好。与"白嘴鸦"会合后往撤离点移动。通话完毕。

Container.name: 15_HVTDown
Container.situation: fox reports that he's taken out the high value target.

Key.Original: Bishop, update, Pegasus neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，狀況更新，"飛馬"已殲滅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，状况更新，"飞马"已歼灭。完毕。

Key.Original: Solid work, Fox. All callsigns, be advised, Pegasus is down. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，"狐狸"。所有單位，請注意，"飛馬"已解決。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，"狐狸"。所有单位，请注意，"飞马"已解决。通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_HVT
Container.situation: high value target operating in the area

Key.Original: Understood, Bishop, no risks. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"主教"，不會有風險的。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"主教"，不会有风险的。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Fox, message, intel puts Pegasus in your operational area.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，訊息，情報指出"飛馬"正出沒在你的行動區域內。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，信息，情报指出"飞马"正出现你的行动区域内。

Key.Original: Cleared to engage, but do not compromise the operation. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 自由交戰，但不要搞砸任務。了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许交战，但不要搞砸任务。了解吗?

Container.name: 05_Regrouped
Container.situation: fox checks in after linking up with rest of his team.

Key.Original: Bishop, this is Fox, I've regrouped with my team. Over.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，這裡是"狐狸"，我已經與我的隊員會合了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，这里是"狐狸"，我已经与我的队员会合了。完毕。

Key.Original: Confirmed, Fox. Expedite. We're against the clock on this one. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"狐狸"。加快速度。我們必須在時間內完成任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，"狐狸"。加快速度。我们必须在时间内完成任务。通话完毕。

Container.name: 03_GetItGotIt
Container.situation: fox knows, ok.

Key.Original: Yeah, I got it.
Key.Chinese: 是呀，我收到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是呀，我收到了。

Key.Original: You copy that, Fox?
Key.Chinese: 你收到了嗎，"狐狸"?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你收到了吗，"狐狸"?

Key.Original: Ok, I'll be here. Signal when it's done. Good luck.
Key.Chinese: Ok，我會在這裡。等你們成功後通知我。祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，我会在这里。等你们成功后通知我。祝好运。

Container.name: 01_Situation
Container.situation: rook giving a sitrep to bishop

Key.Original: Bishop, this is Rook. We're in position.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，這裡是"白嘴鴉"。我們已就定位了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，这里是"白嘴鸦"。我们已就位。

Key.Original: Fox is en route to his team. Drones will be online ASAP. Over.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"正前往與他的隊員會合。無人機將會盡快上線。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"正去与他的队员会合。无人机将会尽快上线。完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Rook. Ok, all callsigns, get it done. Execute then exfil. Bishop out.
Key.Chinese: 已確認，"白嘴鴉"。Ok，所有單位，開始動作。執行後撤離。"主教"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已确认，"白嘴鸦"。Ok，所有单位，开始动作。执行后撤离。"主教"通话完毕。

Container.name: x05_KeepGoing
Container.situation: generic motivational line

Key.Original: Ok, Nomads! Keep it up!
Key.Chinese: Ok，"游牧民"!繼續努力!
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，"游牧民"!继续努力!

Key.Original: Let's punch further south!
Key.Chinese: 讓我們再往南推進!
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们再往南推进!

Container.name: x01_WhereYouGo
Container.situation: generic player fucking around handling

Key.Original: Nomad-2, what's your status? We're still waiting for you up here. Get a move on!
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"-2"，你的狀況如何?我們還在這邊等你。快點過來!
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"-2"，你的状况如何?我们还在这边等你。快点过来!

Container.name: 10_Village_Seized
Container.participants: RC B Nomad Lead;RC B HQ;
Container.situation: molos seized, mission complete

Key.Original: Copy that. Charlie's en route. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"Charlie's"已開始移動。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"查理"已开始移动。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Nomad. Objective one clear, you can send in the sweep team. Over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，這裡是"游牧民"。目標已安全，你可以開始派遣掃除小隊了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"游牧民"。目标已安全，你可以开始派遣清理小组了。完毕。

Container.name: 05_Meeting
Container.situation: platoon complete, heading to battle

Key.Original: Ok, all Nomads, listen up! Good news is our AA's keeping their air support options limited.
Key.Chinese: Ok，全"游牧民"隊員，聽好了!好消息是我們的防空砲一直讓對方的空中支援選擇有限。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，"游牧民"全队都有，听好了!好消息是我们的防空炮一直让对方的空中支援受限。

Key.Original: Bad news, we expect to encounter some resistance once we crest these hills.
Key.Chinese: 而壞消息，是一旦我們翻越這個山坡就會遇到一些阻力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而坏消息，是一旦我们翻越这个山坡就会遇到一些阻力。

Key.Original: Reports indicate infantry, APCs - even a couple of Main Battle Tanks.
Key.Chinese: 報告中指出敵軍有步兵，裝甲運兵車-甚至是幾臺主戰坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 报告中指出敌军有步兵，装甲运兵车-甚至是几辆主战坦克。

Key.Original: So stay focused. Keep formation. Let's roll out.
Key.Chinese: 所以要持續警戒。保持隊形。我們上吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以要持续警戒。保持队形。我们上吧。

Container.name: 01_Intro
Container.participants: RC B Nomad Lead;RC B Tank Driver;
Container.situation: mission start, player reports to his platoon

Key.Original: Acknowledged, we saw you landing. Get yourselves into gear and link up with us on the frontline.
Key.Chinese: 已確認，我們剛看到你降落了。進入你的坦克後到前線與我們會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已确认，我们刚看到你降落了。进入你的坦克后到前线与我们会合。

Key.Original: Nomad, this is Nomad-2, we've just arrived at the staging area, over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，這裡是"游牧民"-2"，我們剛抵達臨停區，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，这里是"游牧民"-2"，我们刚抵达区，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. ETA 2 mikes. Nomad-2 out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。預計抵達時間為2分鐘。"游牧民"-2"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。预计抵达时间为2分钟。"游牧民"-2"通话完毕。

Container.name: 40_JoinAssault
Container.situation: alpha team leader let's his team members know they will now join the main assault on the enemy base

Key.Original: Bravo, lock down the outpost. Sweep AO for casualties.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo"，封鎖前哨。然後掃視行動區域內的傷亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"，封锁前哨。然后打扫作战区域清点伤亡。

Key.Original: Alpha, Echo, move up and support Nomad. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，"Echo"，移動並支援"游牧民"。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，"回声"，移动并支援"游牧民"。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Container.name: x45_EchoDestroyed
Container.situation: hq tells player that they lost contact with echo team

Key.Original: Alpha, be advised, we can't raise Echo. Presumed KIA. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，請注意，我們已經與"Echo"失去聯繫。可能全員陣亡了。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，请注意，我们已经与"回声"失去联系。推断全员阵亡。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Container.name: x40_MinefieldImpossible
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: hq orders player to defuse the minefield but he lost his toolkit

Key.Original: Corporal Kerry, can you assist? Over.
Key.Chinese: 克里下士，你能支援嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士，你能支援吗?完毕。

Key.Original: What the fuck, Kerry? That is unacceptable!
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼，克里?這真是太離譜了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼，克里?这不能接受!

Key.Original: Stay put and await further orders. Out.
Key.Chinese: 留在原地並等待進一步命令。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 留在原地并等待进一步命令。通话完毕。

Key.Original: No can do, sir. I've - I don't have my kit, sir.
Key.Chinese: 恕難從命，長官。我-我沒有帶著我的工具包，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恕难从命，长官。我-我没有带着我的工具包，长官。

Container.name: x35_DestroyArty
Container.participants: RC B Alpha Lead;RC B Kerry;
Container.situation: alpha squad leader orders player to destroy arty vehicle

Key.Original: Kerry, we need to put that gun out of action. Set up your charges.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我們必須讓這些火砲失去作用。設置你的炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我们必须让这些火炮失去作用。设置炸药。

Key.Original: Everyone else, find some hard cover!
Key.Chinese: 其餘人，找一些重型掩護!
Key.Chinesesimp: 其余人，找一些厚重掩护!

Key.Original: On it, sir.
Key.Chinese: 正在做了，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在做了，长官。

Container.name: x30_DestroyAa
Container.participants: RC B Alpha Lead;RC B Kerry;
Container.situation: alpha squad leader orders player to destroy aa vehicle

Key.Original: Kerry, we need to put that AAA out of action. Set up your charges.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我們必須讓這些高射炮失去作用。設置你的炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我们必须让这些防空系统失去作用。设置炸药。

Key.Original: Everyone else, find some hard cover!
Key.Chinese: 其餘人，找一些重型掩護!
Key.Chinesesimp: 其余人，找一些厚重掩护!

Key.Original: On it, sir.
Key.Chinese: 正在做了，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在做了，长官。

Container.name: x20_DestroyVehiclesHurryUp
Container.situation: alpha squad leader order player to destroy the vehicles asap

Key.Original: Corporal Kerry, get a move on!
Key.Chinese: 克里下士，開始動作!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士，速度快点!

Key.Original: We need those vehicles disabled, ASAP!
Key.Chinese: 我們需要解決那些載具，盡快!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要解决那些车辆，尽快!

Container.name: x15_HeavyCasualtiesTeamRoadBlockWin
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: player tells alpha squad leader that he was able to secure the road block all by himself

Key.Original: Say again, Corporal Kerry? Road block is clear? Over.
Key.Chinese: 再說一次，克里下士?路障清除了?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说一次，克里下士?路障清除了?完毕。

Key.Original: Well, uh, good work, Kerry! I'll notify command. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這，嗯，幹的好，克里!我會通知指揮官。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这，嗯，干的好，克里!我会通知指挥部。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Sir, update, road block is clear. Over.
Key.Chinese: 長官，狀況更新，路障已肅清。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，状况更新，路障已肃清。完毕。

Key.Original: I saw an opportunity, sir, and I took it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我看到一絲機會，長官，而且我把握住了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看到一丝机会，长官，而且我把握住了。完毕。

Container.name: x10_HeavyCasualtiesTeamRoadBlock
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: player tells alpha squad leader that all his team members are dead

Key.Original: Dammit, we needed that flank secured.
Key.Chinese: 該死，我們必須確保那邊是安全的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我们必须确保那边是安全的。

Key.Original: Alright, keep your head down, Corporal. Fall back to the outpost.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，保持低調，下士。撤退回前哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，保持低调，下士。撤退回前哨。

Key.Original: Fuck! Sir, my team's down! I'm the only one left - please advise! Over!
Key.Chinese: 幹!長官，我的隊員全倒了!我是唯一一個活著的-請指示!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操!长官，我的小组全死了!我是唯一一个活着的-请指示!完毕!

Key.Original: Papa Bear, be advised, Alpha's taken casualties. Road block not clear - I say again - road block is not clear.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，請注意，"Alpha"有重大傷亡。路障未肅清-我重覆一次-路障未肅清。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，请注意，"阿尔法"有重大伤亡。路障未肃清-我重复一次-路障未肃清。

Container.name: x05_HeavyCasualtiesTeamFactory
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: player tells alpha squad leader that all his team members are dead

Key.Original: Dammit, we needed that flank secured.
Key.Chinese: 該死，我們必須確保那邊是安全的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我们必须确保那边是安全的。

Key.Original: Alright, keep your head down, Corporal. Fall back to the outpost.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，保持低調，下士。撤退回前哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，保持低调，下士。撤退回前哨。

Key.Original: Fuck! Sir, my team's down! I'm the only one left - please advise! Over!
Key.Chinese: 幹!長官，我的隊員全倒了!我是唯一一個活著的-請指示!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操!长官，我的小组全完了!我是唯一一个活着的-请指示!完毕!

Key.Original: Papa Bear, be advised, Alpha's taken casualties. Industrial complex not clear - I say again - complex is not clear. AT threat remains. Over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，請注意，"Alpha"有重大傷亡。工業區未肅清-我重覆一次-工業區未肅清。反坦克威脅依然存在。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，请注意，"阿尔法"有重大伤亡。工业区未肃清-我重复一次-工业区未肃清。反坦克威胁依然存在。完毕。

Container.name: x00_HeavyCasualtiesSquad
Container.participants: RC B HQ;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: alpha leader tells hq that his squad has taken too many casualties, hq orders them to fall back

Key.Original: Papa Bear, we've taken too many casualties, we've got to abort! Over!
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，我們已經傷亡太多了，我們必須撤退!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，我们已经伤亡太多了，我们必须撤退!完毕!

Key.Original: Dammit, Alpha. Fall back. I say again, fall back! Out.
Key.Chinese: 該死，"Alpha"。撤退。我重覆一次，撤退!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，"阿尔法"。撤退。我重覆一次，撤退!通话完毕。

Container.name: 95_Ending
Container.situation: hq gives a brief sitrep before mission ends

Key.Original: Ok, Kilo-8, move in and clear that wreck out of the way.
Key.Chinese: Ok，"Kilo-8"，移動並清理那擋在路面上的殘骸。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，"基洛-8"，移动并清理那挡在路面上的残骸。

Key.Original: Get these trucks moving; we're pushing north! Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 讓那些卡車開始移動;我們要開始向北推進了!"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让那些卡车开始移动;我们要开始向北推进了!"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Container.name: 90_MinefieldDefused
Container.situation: player tells hq that the minefield is defused

Key.Original: Copy that. Outstanding work, Alpha-5. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。幹的好，"Alpha-5"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。干的好，"阿尔法"-5"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, update, mines defused. Path is clear. Over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，狀況更新，地雷已解除。道路已淨空。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，状况更新，地雷已解除。道路已净空。完毕。

Container.name: 85_Minefield
Container.situation: logistics hit a mine field and find that more mines are still active in the area, player is sent to defuse them

Key.Original: Copy that. It's imperative we get these supplies moving, Alpha-5.
Key.Chinese: 收到。我們必須讓這些補給卡車移動，"Alpha"-5。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。我们必须让这些补给卡车移动，"阿尔法"-5。

Key.Original: Move in and clear the path. Out.
Key.Chinese: 移動到那並清理道路。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到那并清理道路。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Alpha-5, I'm in the vicinity and on hand if needed. Over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，這裡是"Alpha"-5，如果有需要幫忙的話我人在附近。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"阿尔法"-5，如果有需要帮忙的话我人在附近。完毕。

Container.name: 80_LogisticsMinefield
Container.participants: RC B HQ;RC B Kerry;RC B Kilo Lead;
Container.situation: logistics hit a mine field and find that more mines are still active in the area, player is sent to defuse them

Key.Original: Roger that, Kilo. Status report?
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Kilo"。狀況回報?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"基洛"。状态报告?

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Kilo. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"Kilo"。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"基洛"。请稍等。

Key.Original: Shit! Papa Bear, this is Kilo! Our lead vehicle's just hit a mine, over.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的!"熊爸爸"，這裡是"Kilo"!我們的領頭車剛被一個地雷擊中，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的!"熊爸爸"，这里是"基洛"!我们的头车刚压中了地雷，完毕。

Key.Original: We're fine - Kilo-2's a mess - but no casualties. Looks like we've got a minefield, Papa Bear. Orders?
Key.Chinese: 我們還好-"Kilo"-2已成為一團垃圾了-但所幸沒有傷亡。看來我們遇到地雷區了，"熊爸爸"。命令?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们还好-"基洛-2"一团糟-但所幸没有伤亡。看来我们遇到地雷区了，"熊爸爸"。命令?

Container.name: 75_Logistics
Container.participants: RC B HQ;RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: hq requests alpha to send someone to meet with logistics and coordinate a good setup position

Key.Original: Affirmative, Papa Bear. Dispatching Alpha-5.
Key.Chinese: 可以的，"熊爸爸"。將派出"Alpha-5"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可以的，"熊爸爸"。将派出"阿尔法"-5"。

Key.Original: Kerry, link up with the convoy at the main base. How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 克里，與車隊在主基地會合。有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，与车队在主基地会合。有收到吗?完毕。

Key.Original: All callsigns, good work: the AO is under our control.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，幹的好:行動區域已經在我們的掌控之下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，干的好:行动区域已经在我们的掌控之下。

Key.Original: Alpha, logistics are inbound. Can you spare an engineer to coordinate the setup? Over.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，補給隊正在過來當中。你能抽出一名工兵來幫忙他們嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，补给队正在来的路上。你能抽出一名工兵来帮忙他们吗?完毕。

Key.Original: On the move, sir. Out.
Key.Chinese: 正要過去了，長官。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正要过去了，长官。通话完毕。

Container.name: 70_RoadBlockClear
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: player let's his squad leader know that the road block is clear of enemy

Key.Original: Good work, Kerry, I'll radio command. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，克里，我會通知指揮官。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，克里，我会通知指挥部。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Sir, update, road block secure. Over.
Key.Chinese: 長官，狀況更新，路障已肅清。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，状况更新，路障已肃清。完毕。

Container.name: 65_Support
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Echo Lead;
Container.situation: player call's apc support to the road block

Key.Original: Copy that, moving up. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，正趕過去。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，正赶过去。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Echo, we need support at the road block. Can you assist? Over.
Key.Chinese: "Echo"，我們在路障需要支援。你們能過來嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声"，我们在路障需要支援。你们能过来吗?完毕。

Container.name: 60_RoadBlock
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;RC B Echo Lead;
Container.situation: alpha squad leader orders player to move in and secure the road block, mentions that his now can call echo as a support

Key.Original: Kerry, we need you to clear out an enemy road block north east of your position.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我需要你去你位置的東北方清理掉一個敵軍路障。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我需要你去你位置的东北方清理掉一个敌军路障。

Key.Original: Light infantry and fortifications. Can you handle it? Over.
Key.Chinese: 有少量的步兵與防禦工事。你可以勝任嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有少量的步兵与防御工事。你可以胜任吗?完毕。

Key.Original: Perfect. Move up, clear the area, and report in.
Key.Chinese: 太棒了。開始移動，肅清該區，然後向我回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太棒了。开始移动，肃清该区，然后向我回报。

Key.Original: Echo, this is Alpha, be advised, we're advancing. Are you ready to assist? Over.
Key.Chinese: "Echo"，這裡是"Alpha"，請注意，我們開始推進了。你們準備好支援了嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声"，这里是"阿尔法"，请注意，我们开始推进了。你们准备好支援了吗?完毕。

Key.Original: Yes, sir. Just give the order, sir. Over.
Key.Chinese: 是的，長官。只要你下達命令，長官。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，长官。只要你下达命令，长官。完毕。

Key.Original: Kerry, Echo is in support if necessary. Make damn sure that it's clear for the IFVs before calling them in. Understood? Over.
Key.Chinese: 克里，假如你有需要的話，"Echo"可以隨時支援。請務必確認該區已無可以對裝甲運兵車造成威脅的武器，在請求他們的支援。了解嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，假如你有需要的话，"回声"可以随时支援。请务必确认该区已无可以对装甲运兵车造成威胁的武器，再请求他们的支援。了解吗?完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Alpha, Echo standing by.
Key.Chinese: 是的，"Alpha"，"Echo"已經準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，"阿尔法"，"回声"已经准备好了。

Key.Original: Copy that, sir. We're on it. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，長官。我們在路上了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，长官。我们在路上了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 55_FactoryClear
Container.participants: RC B Kerry;RC B Alpha Lead;RC B Echo Lead;
Container.situation: player let's his leader know that the factory complex is seized of enemy, his leader sends the apc's to secure the factory

Key.Original: Good job, Kerry. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，克里。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，克里。请稍等。

Key.Original: Echo-lead this is Alpha. Route is secure; you're clear to move up. Acknowledge, over.
Key.Chinese: "Echo"隊長，這裡是"Alpha"。路已安全;你們可以開始移動了。是否收到，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声"领队，这里是"阿尔法"。路已安全;你们可以开始移动了。是否收到，完毕。

Key.Original: Sir, AT threat neutralized! Over.
Key.Chinese: 長官，反坦克威脅已清除!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，反坦克威胁已清除!完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that, we're rolling. Thanks for the assist, Alpha. Echo out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，我們正在移動。感謝你們的支援，"Alpha"。"Echo"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，我们正在移动。感谢你们的支援，"阿尔法"。"回声"通话完毕。

Container.name: 50_SplitTeam
Container.participants: RC B Alpha Lead;RC B Kerry;
Container.situation: alpha squad leader gives player the command of half the squad so he can lead them and engage anti-tank position

Key.Original: Ok, new orders! We've got to clear a path for Echo.
Key.Chinese: Ok，新命令!我們必須為"Echo"清理道路。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，新命令!我们必须为"回声"清理道路。

Key.Original: Kerry! Take Ryan, Lacey and Taylor. Advance and secure the AT position to our north east. Understood?
Key.Chinese: 克里!帶著瑞安，萊西和泰勒。向東北推進並肅清敵軍反坦克陣地。了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里!带上瑞安，莱西和泰勒。向东北推进并肃清敌军反坦克阵地。了解吗?

Key.Original: Copy that, Sir.
Key.Chinese: 收到，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，长官。

Key.Original: Alright, you heard it, guys. Let's move out!
Key.Chinese: 好的，你們都聽到了，大夥。讓我們開始移動吧!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，你们都听到了，大伙。让我们开始移动吧!

Container.name: 45_Factory
Container.participants: RC B HQ;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: hq let's alpha know about multiple enemy anti-tank positions that need to be neutralized before apc's can move in

Key.Original: Solid copy, Papa Bear. We're on it. Alpha out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"熊爸爸"。我們在路上了。"Alpha"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"熊爸爸"。我们在路上了。"阿尔法"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Alpha, priority. We've got anti-tank units blocking Echo's advance.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，優先級任務。我們發現有反坦克單位擋在"Echo"的必經之路上。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，优先级任务。我们发现有反坦克单位挡在"回声"的必经之路上。

Key.Original: We need that route clear, ASAP. They're holed up in two areas of the industrial district.
Key.Chinese: 我們需要肅清那條路，盡快。他們躲在兩個工業區裡面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要肃清那条路，尽快。他们躲在两个工业区里面。

Key.Original: Move up and neutralize those positions. Immediate execute, how copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 移動並肅清那些位置。立即執行，有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动并肃清那些位置。立即执行，有收到吗?完毕。

Container.name: 43_AssaultPlan
Container.situation: alpha team leader let's his team members know they will now join the main assault on the enemy base

Key.Original: Listen up! Heavy armor's rolling in from the west.
Key.Chinese: 聽好了!我方坦克正從西面開始向這裡移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听好了!我方坦克正从西面开始向这里移动。

Key.Original: We'll move up with Echo in support of the main assault from the south. Move out!
Key.Chinese: 我們要與"Echo"一同從南方支援主要攻擊。開始移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们要与"回声"一同从南方支援主要攻击。开始移动!

Container.name: 37_MainAssault
Container.situation: main assault is signalled

Key.Original: All callsigns, we are go for main objective. Commence the assault - give 'em hell!
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，我們要開始前往主要目標了。開始突擊-打的他們屎尿齊發!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，我们要开始前往主要目标了。开始突击-把他们往死里打!

Container.name: 35_OutpostSitrep
Container.participants: RC B Alpha Lead;RC B HQ;
Container.situation: alpha squad leader orders player to destroy enemy vehicles at the outpost

Key.Original: Alpha to Papa Bear, support vehicles neutralized, outpost secure. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"致"熊爸爸"，支援載具已摧毀，前哨已肅清。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"致"熊爸爸"，支援载具已摧毁，前哨已肃清。完毕。

Key.Original: Outstanding, Alpha. Stand by for further orders. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，"Alpha"。請等待更進一步命令。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，"阿尔法"。请等待更进一步命令。通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_DestroyVehicles
Container.participants: RC B Alpha Lead;RC B Kerry;
Container.situation: alpha squad leader orders player to destroy enemy vehicles at the outpost

Key.Original: Kerry, we need to put those vehicles out of action. Set up your charges.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我們必須讓這些載具失去作用。設置你的炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我们必须让这些车辆失去作用。设置炸药。

Key.Original: Everyone else, find some hard cover!
Key.Chinese: 其餘人，找一些重型掩護!
Key.Chinesesimp: 其余人，找一些厚重掩护!

Key.Original: On it, sir.
Key.Chinese: 正在做了，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在做了，长官。

Container.name: 25_OutpostClear
Container.situation: alpha squad leader let's his team members know they did a good job and the enemy outpost is clear

Key.Original: Great work, gentlemen, the outpost is secure!
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，先生們，前哨是我們的了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，先生们，前哨是我们的了!

Container.name: 23_GoGoGo
Container.situation: alpha talks shouts to his team

Key.Original: Ok, let's go!
Key.Chinese: Ok，我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，我们走!

Container.name: 20_StagingArea
Container.participants: RC B Alpha Lead;RC B HQ;
Container.situation: infantry teams let hq know they are ready at staging area, hq orders them to move in and assault enemy outpost

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Alpha. In position at the staging area. Over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，這裡是"Alpha"。已經在等待區就定位了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"阿尔法"。已经在等待区就定位了。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. Alpha, Bravo, Echo, move in!
Key.Chinese: 收到。"Alpha"，"Bravo"，"Echo"，開始攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"阿尔法"，"布拉沃"，"回声"，开始攻击!

Container.name: 17_UavDestroyed
Container.situation: hq let's teams know that contact with uav was lost, probably destroyed

Key.Original: Be advised, we've just lost contact with our UAV. Out.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，我們剛與無人偵察機失去聯繫。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，我们刚与无人侦察机失去联系。通话完毕。

Container.name: 15_UAVOnline
Container.situation: hq lets infantry teams know that uav feed is now available

Key.Original: All callsigns, be advised, drone coming online now.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請注意，無人偵察機已上線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请注意，无人侦察机已上线。

Container.name: 10_MoveThroughCover
Container.situation: alpha squad leader orders his team to move to staging point through cover, inside the ditch

Key.Original: Ok, listen up. We're moving to the staging area.
Key.Chinese: Ok，聽好了。我們開始向等待區移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，听好了。我们开始向等待区移动。

Key.Original: Follow the ditch and keep your heads down.
Key.Chinese: 沿著溝渠前進並保持低調。
Key.Chinesesimp: 沿着沟渠前进并保持低调。

Container.name: 05_InsertionFinished
Container.situation: alpha signals the team to move.

Key.Original: Let's go, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 我們走，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走，先生们。

Container.name: 03_ObjectivesOverview
Container.participants: RC B Echo Lead;RC B HQ;RC B Alpha Lead;
Container.situation: echo team provide sitrep for command

Key.Original: Wilco, Papa Bear. Out.
Key.Chinese: 照辦，"熊爸爸"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 照办，"熊爸爸"。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Echo.
Key.Chinese: 已確認，"Echo"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已确认，"回声"。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Echo, approaching objective. Over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，這裡是"Echo"，靠近目標中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"回声"，靠近目标中。完毕。

Key.Original: Alpha, be advised, all callsigns in position. Move to staging area and report in. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha"，請注意，所有單位皆已就位。請前往等待區並回報。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法"，请注意，所有单位皆已就位。请前往等待区并回报。完毕。

Container.name: 01_ReadyUp
Container.situation: echo team signals to alpha, sitting in the back

Key.Original: Ready up, Alpha, we're in the AO.
Key.Chinese: 準備好，"Alpha"，我們已經在行動區域內了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备好，"阿尔法"，我们已经在行动区域内了。

Container.name: MiscRC
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor

Key.Original: Bull's eye!
Key.Chinese: 命中靶心!
Key.Chinesesimp: 命中靶心!

Key.Original: Good aim!
Key.Chinese: 瞄的好!
Key.Chinesesimp: 瞄的好!

Key.Original: Green
Key.Chinese: 綠色
Key.Chinesesimp: 绿色

Key.Original: Red
Key.Chinese: 紅色
Key.Chinesesimp: 红色

Key.Original: Score!
Key.Chinese: 得分!
Key.Chinesesimp: 得分!

Key.Original: Accuracy bonus
Key.Chinese: 精準獎勵
Key.Chinesesimp: 精准奖励

Key.Original: Bonus!
Key.Chinese: 獎勵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 奖励!

Key.Original: Bonus target
Key.Chinese: 獎勵目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 奖励目标

Key.Original: Got it!
Key.Chinese: 打到了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 打到了!

Key.Original: Found one!
Key.Chinese: 你找到一個了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你找到一个了!

Key.Original: Wrong color!
Key.Chinese: 錯誤的顏色!
Key.Chinesesimp: 错误的颜色!

Key.Original: Bad color!
Key.Chinese: 不是這個顏色!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是这个颜色!

Key.Original: Blue
Key.Chinese: 藍色
Key.Chinesesimp: 蓝色

Key.Original: Orange
Key.Chinese: 橙色
Key.Chinesesimp: 橙色

Key.Original: Black
Key.Chinese: 黑色
Key.Chinesesimp: 黑色

Key.Original: Purple
Key.Chinese: 紫色
Key.Chinesesimp: 紫色

Key.Original: Pink
Key.Chinese: 粉紅色
Key.Chinesesimp: 粉红色

Key.Original: Gold
Key.Chinese: 金色
Key.Chinesesimp: 金色

Key.Original: Endstar!
Key.Chinese: 結束之星!
Key.Chinesesimp: 结束之星!

Key.Original: Bend Star!
Key.Chinese: 彎曲之星!
Key.Chinesesimp: 弯曲之星!

Container.name: COFGreenRC
Container.situation: radio tutorial instructions from the range officer to the competitor for training. brevity and quick speech are key for timing (especially during the course)!

Key.Original: Find and shoot optional targets to win bonuses.
Key.Chinese: 尋找並射擊獎勵目標來獲得獎勵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并射击奖励目标来获得奖励。

Key.Original: These targets trigger yet more targets.
Key.Chinese: 這些目標會觸發更多的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些目标会触发更多的目标。

Key.Original: Some targets need several shots.
Key.Chinese: 有些目標需要多射幾發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有些目标需要多射几发。

Key.Original: Visible scoring zones introduce a speed-versus-accuracy trade-off by way of bonuses.
Key.Chinese: 可見得分區引進一套系統，檢驗你的速度與精準度，由此來給你獎勵分數。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可见得分区引进一套系统，检验你的速度与精准度，由此来给你奖励分数。

Key.Original: When a color is called out, only hit targets of that color.
Key.Chinese: 當我念出顏色時，你只能射擊我所喊的顏色。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当我念出颜色时，你只能射击我所喊的颜色。

Key.Original: Morning
Key.Chinese: 早晨
Key.Chinesesimp: 早晨

Key.Original: Evening
Key.Chinese: 晚上
Key.Chinesesimp: 晚上

Key.Original: Noon
Key.Chinese: 中午
Key.Chinesesimp: 中午

Key.Original: Tanks
Key.Chinese: 坦克
Key.Chinesesimp: 坦克

Key.Original: Gunships
Key.Chinese: 武裝直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装直升机

Key.Original: Drones
Key.Chinese: 無人載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 无人载具

Key.Original: Arma
Key.Chinese: 武裝突襲
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装突袭

Key.Original: Faction: OPFOR
Key.Chinese: 陣營:紅方
Key.Chinesesimp: 阵营:红方

Key.Original: Faction: INDEPENDENT
Key.Chinese: 陣營:反抗軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 阵营:反抗军

Key.Original: Faction: BLUFOR
Key.Chinese: 陣營:藍方
Key.Chinesesimp: 阵营:蓝方

Key.Original: Minutes awarded for capturing a sector
Key.Chinese: 佔領一個區域能得到的獎勵時間
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领一个区域能得到的奖励时间

Key.Original: No time limit
Key.Chinese: 沒有時間限制
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有时间限制

Key.Original: Respawn slots awarded for capturing a sector
Key.Chinese: 佔領一個區域能得到的重生次數
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领一个区域能得到的重生次数

Key.Original: No respawn limit
Key.Chinese: 沒有重生限制
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有重生限制

Key.Original: Seize enemy territory by capturing strongpoints.
Key.Chinese: 藉由佔領全部的區域，來達成佔領敵人的領土。
Key.Chinesesimp: 藉由占领全部的区域来占领敌人的领土。

Key.Original: Seize Edoris
Key.Chinese: 佔領埃佐里斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领埃佐里斯

Key.Original:
OPFOR presence on the South West of Altis has been increasing in the last couple of weeks, they have established camps and bases bringing instability within the region.

Local guerrillas have requested help to push the OPFOR away from the bay and re-establish the docking of supply boats in the area.
Key.Chinese:
紅軍在過去幾周，持續在阿爾蒂斯島的西南方穩定建設營地與基地。

當地的游擊隊請求幫忙擊退紅軍在海灣附近的據點，好來讓補給船隻可以進入海灣。
Key.Chinesesimp:
红军在过去几周，持续在阿尔蒂斯岛的西南方稳定建设营地与基地。

当地的游击队请求帮忙击退红军在海湾附近的据点，好来让补给船只可以进入海湾。

Key.Original: Zeus 10 Seize Edoris
Key.Chinese: 宙斯10肅清埃佐里斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 宙斯10肃清埃佐里斯

Key.Original: Seize enemy strong points along the bay.
Key.Chinese: 佔領敵人沿岸的強力據點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领敌人沿岸的强力据点。

Key.Original:
1. Seize Alpha
2. Seize Bravo
3. Seize Charlie
4. Seize Delta
5. Seize Echo
Key.Chinese:
1. 佔領"Alpha"
2. 佔領"Bravo"
3. 佔領"Charlie"
4. 佔領"Delta"
5. 佔領"Echo"
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 占领"阿尔法"
2. 占领"布拉沃"
3. 占领"查理"
4. 占领"德尔塔"
5. 占领"回声"

Key.Original: A Course of Fire set on top of a hill with medium to long-range sniping.
Key.Chinese: 一個設置在山頂的靶場，包含中距離與長距離的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个设置在山顶的靶场，包含中距离与长距离的目标。

Key.Original: CoF: Orange 3
Key.Chinese: 靶場:橙色3
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场:橙色3

Key.Original: An event containing both close engagements and extreme long-range shooting.
Key.Chinese: 此課程包含近距離作戰與遠距離交火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此课程包含近距离作战与远距离交火。

Key.Original: CoF: Orange 2
Key.Chinese: 靶場:橙色2
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场:橙色2

Key.Original: A different take on close-quarters combat set in heavy morning fog.
Key.Chinese: 在濃厚的晨霧中，體驗一種不同的近距離作戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在浓厚的晨雾中，体验一种不同的近距离作战。

Key.Original: CoF: Blue 3
Key.Chinese: 靶場:藍色3
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场:蓝色3

Key.Original: A night-time urban course making use of flashlights and night vision.
Key.Chinese: 一個夜晚的城市，你必須使用手電筒或夜視鏡來幫助你找尋目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个夜晚的城市，你必须使用手电筒或夜视镜来帮助你找寻目标。

Key.Original: CoF: Blue 2
Key.Chinese: 靶場:藍色2
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场:蓝色2

Key.Original: Clear a smaller course before driving to a primary objective near the mines.
Key.Chinese: 先清理一個小型靶場，之後駕駛車輛到主要目標(在地雷區附近)。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先清理一个小型靶场，之后驾驶车辆到主要目标(在地雷区附近)。

Key.Original: CoF: Red 3
Key.Chinese: 靶場:紅色3
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场:红色3

Key.Original: An exploration of ancient castle ruins sets this unique multi-gun event apart.
Key.Chinese: 在此關，你將探索一座古城，並在這種地形下使用多種武器來應付出現的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在此关，你将探索一座古城，并在这种地形下使用多种武器来应付出现的目标。

Key.Original: CoF: Red 2
Key.Chinese: 靶場:紅色2
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场:红色2

Key.Original: Multi-Gunner: specific weapons are to be used for consecutive segments of the drills
Key.Chinese: 精通武器:在此課程，將有多把特殊武器在各站點被指定使用
Key.Chinesesimp: 精通武器:在此课程，将有多把特殊武器在各站点被指定使用

Key.Original: Red
Key.Chinese: 紅色
Key.Chinesesimp: 红色

Key.Original: Marksman: long-range engagements and use of accuracy targets
Key.Chinese: 神射手:挑戰你遠距離開火的精準度
Key.Chinesesimp: 神射手:挑战你远距离开火的精准度

Key.Original: Orange
Key.Chinese: 橙色
Key.Chinesesimp: 橙色

Key.Original: Tactical Combatant: close-quarters environments with possible no-shoot targets
Key.Chinese: 戰術作戰:一個近距離的作戰環境，其中包括一些不能射擊的目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 战术作战:一个近距离的作战环境，其中包括一些不能射击的目标

Key.Original: Blue
Key.Chinese: 藍色
Key.Chinesesimp: 蓝色

Key.Original: Green
Key.Chinese: 綠色
Key.Chinesesimp: 绿色

Key.Original: Trainee: an introduction to the rules and target types
Key.Chinese: 新進學員:一個簡單的介紹，包括靶場規則與靶的類型
Key.Chinesesimp: 新进学员:一个简单的介绍，包括靶场规则与靶的类型

Key.Original: Turn radio off
Key.Chinese: 關閉無線電
Key.Chinesesimp: 关闭无线电

Key.Original: Turn radio on
Key.Chinese: 開啟無線電
Key.Chinesesimp: 开启无线电

Key.Original: Defend your camp against enemy attacks until the evacuation helicopter arrives.
Key.Chinese: 在敵人的攻擊之中守住你的基地，直到撤離直升機抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在敌人的攻击之中守住你的基地，直到撤离直升机抵达。

Key.Original: The last choppers have left the area leaving you stranded until further evacuation becomes possible.
Key.Chinese: 最後一架直升機已經離開了島嶼，你們必須自行防守，直到撤離直升機可以過來為止。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最后一架直升机已经离开了岛屿，你们必须自行防守，直到撤离直升机可以过来为止。

Key.Original: Defend Syrta
Key.Chinese: 防守西爾塔
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守西尔塔

Key.Original: Zeus 10 Defend Syrta
Key.Chinese: 宙斯10防禦西爾塔
Key.Chinesesimp: 宙斯10防御西尔塔

Key.Original: Make a stance against the imminent BLUFOR attack and survive.
Key.Chinese: 堅持位置，在藍方的攻擊下倖存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚持位置，在蓝方的攻击下幸存。

Key.Original:
1. Survive by defending the village of Syrta
2. Call evacuation chopper when available
3. Leave the area
Key.Chinese:
1. 透過防守西爾塔村莊來存活
2. 等待撤離直升機可以被呼叫
3. 離開該區
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 通过防守西尔塔村来存活
2. 等待撤离直升机可以被呼叫
3. 离开该区

Key.Original: Minutes awarded for capturing a sector
Key.Chinese: 佔領一個區域能得到的獎勵時間
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领一个区域能得到的奖励时间

Key.Original: No time limit
Key.Chinese: 沒有時間限制
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有时间限制

Key.Original: Respawn slots awarded for capturing a sector
Key.Chinese: 佔領一個區域能得到的重生次數
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领一个区域能得到的重生次数

Key.Original: No respawn limit
Key.Chinese: 沒有重生限制
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有重生限制

Key.Original: Seize enemy territory by capturing strongpoints.
Key.Chinese: 藉由佔領全部的區域，來達成佔領敵人的領土。
Key.Chinesesimp: 藉由占领全部的区域，来达成占领敌人的领土。

Key.Original:
Enemy forces have control over a strategically important part of the island. With control over the airfield the enemy has been deploying all kinds of units within the area during the last few days.

We need to shut down their access to the Airfield in order to weaken it's major source of reinforcements.
Key.Chinese:
敵軍掌握了島嶼具戰略地位的部分。透過機場，他們在過去的幾天已經在各區佈署了各種類型的單位。

我們需要關閉那個機場，來阻止他們主要輸入兵源的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp:
敌军掌握了岛屿具战略地位的部分。通过机场，他们在过去的几天已经在各区布署了各种类型的单位。

我们需要关闭那个机场，来阻止他们主要输入兵源的地方。

Key.Original: Seize Feres
Key.Chinese: 佔領費雷斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领费雷斯

Key.Chinese: 宙斯10肅清費雷斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 宙斯10肃清费雷斯

Key.Chinese: 佔領敵軍在阿爾蒂斯東南方的強力據點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领敌军在阿尔蒂斯东南方的强力据点。

Key.Original: Explore the showcase. Use the Strategic Map, accessible from any whiteboard, to quickly move between areas.
Key.Chinese: 探索整個任務展示，透過白板來使用戰略地圖，快速在各個區域移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 探索整个任务展示，通过白板来使用战略地图，快速在各个区域移动。

Key.Chinese: 内奧霍里城市近郊，阿爾蒂斯中部
Key.Chinesesimp: 内奥霍里城近郊，阿尔蒂斯中部

Key.Original: Utilize Arma 3's unmanned ground and aerial vehicles. Complete a daring operation behind enemy lines.
Key.Chinese: 利用武裝突襲3新增的地面與空中無人載具。來完成一個大膽的敵後行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 利用武装突袭3新增的地面与空中无人载具。来完成一个大胆的敌后行动。

Key.Chinese: 任務展示:無人載具-武裝的空中無人載具&地面無人載具，偵察用四軸飛行器，高價值目標

Key.Chinese: "傑斯特"
Key.Chinesesimp: "杰斯特"

Key.Original: Drones
Key.Chinese: 無人載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 无人载具

Key.Original: Hammer
Key.Chinese: "哈默"
Key.Chinesesimp: "哈默"

Key.Original: Rook
Key.Chinese: "白嘴鴉"
Key.Chinesesimp: "白嘴鸦"

Key.Original: Fox
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"

Key.Original: Lone Wolf
Key.Chinese: 孤狼
Key.Chinesesimp: "孤狼"

Key.Original: Despite completing your objective, you abandoned the rest of your team, putting our exfil - and the operation at large - in danger. Command will be notified about this.
Key.Chinese: 儘管你完成了任務，但你卻棄你的小隊於不顧，這對我們整個行動造成莫大的傷害。司令部將收到此次報告。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管你完成了任务，但你却弃你的小队于不顾，这对我们整个行动造成莫大的伤害。司令部将收到此次报告。

Key.Original: Against All Odds
Key.Chinese: 排除萬難
Key.Chinesesimp: 排除万难

Key.Original: Despite losing both autonomous vehicles, you managed to complete your mission and destroy the AA sites. However, Pegasus escaped. Let's hope the enemy forces are not able to rapidly reorganize their defensive network.
Key.Chinese: 儘管失去了無人載具，你仍設法完成了你的任務並摧毀防空陣地。然而，"飛馬"卻逃跑了。我們只能期望敵軍的防禦網路並不會很快地就被重組起來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管失去了无人载具，你仍设法完成了你的任务并摧毁防空阵地。然而"飞马"却逃跑了。我们只能期望敌军的防御网络并不会很快地就被重组起来。

Key.Original: Against All Odds
Key.Chinese: 排除萬難
Key.Chinesesimp: 排除万难

Key.Original: Despite losing both autonomous vehicles, you managed to complete your mission. The enemy's defensive network is in disarray and their capacity to reorganize has been struck a decisive blow. Outstanding work, Fox.
Key.Chinese: 儘管失去了無人載具，你仍設法完成了你的任務。敵人的防禦網路已被重挫，而且他們現在也沒有能力可以自行重組網路了。幹的好，"狐狸"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管失去了无人载具，你仍设法完成了你的任务。敌人的防御网络已被重挫，而且他们现在也没有能力可以自行重组网络了。干的好，"狐狸"。

Key.Original: Pegasus escaped, but you still managed to destroy the AA sites. Let's hope the enemy forces are not able to rapidly reorganize their defensive network.
Key.Chinese: "飛馬"逃跑了，但你仍成功的摧毀了防空陣地。我們只能期望敵軍的防禦網路並不會很快地就被重組起來。
Key.Chinesesimp: "飞马"逃跑了，但你仍成功的摧毁了防空阵地。我们只能期望敌军的防御网不会很快地就被重组起来。

Key.Original: Flawless execution
Key.Chinese: 完美的勝利
Key.Chinesesimp: 完美的胜利

Key.Original: You successfully destroyed the AA sites and neutralized Pegasus. The enemy's defensive network is in disarray and their capacity to reorganize has been struck a decisive blow. Outstanding work, Fox.
Key.Chinese: 你成功的摧毀防空陣地並殲滅"飛馬"。敵人的防禦網路已被重挫，而且他們現在也沒有能力可以自行重組網路了。幹的好，"狐狸"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功的摧毁防空阵地并歼灭"飞马"。敌人的防御网络已被重挫，而且他们现在也没有能力可以自行重组网络了。干的好，"狐狸"。

Key.Original: Retreated
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: You were unable to complete your mission after losing both of your drones. At least you live to fight another day.
Key.Chinese: 你在失去所有的無人載具後，已沒有能力繼續執行任務。但至少你仍活著並成功撤退，這讓我們能擇日再戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在失去所有的无人载具后，已没有能力继续执行任务。但至少你仍活着并成功撤退，这让我们能择日再战。

Key.Original: Missing in Action
Key.Chinese: 任務中失蹤
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务中失踪

Key.Original: Out of Time
Key.Chinese: 超出時間限制
Key.Chinesesimp: 超出时间限制

Key.Original: You could not complete your objective in the allotted time. This is a major setback, Fox. Command may have to re-evaluate the entire offensive based on this failure.
Key.Chinese: 你不能在規定的時間內完成所有目標。這真是一個挫敗。指揮部將因為這次失敗，而只好重新擬定所有攻擊計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不能在规定的时间内完成所有目标。这真是一个挫败。指挥部将因为这次失败，而只好重新拟定所有攻击计划。

Key.Original: Recon has identified a fortified network of defenses that secure the southern approach to %1the island's main airport%2, coordinated by a regional commander, codenamed Pegasus. Ahead of our assault on Altis, our goal is to disrupt their defensive capability.%3To that end, four teams have been inserted into enemy territory via the coast, including your team, %4Fox%5, and an extraction element, %6Rook%7. Your task is to neutralize two anti-air launcher platforms in the vicinity of %8Neochori%9 before the main assault begins at 0450 hours. %10Jester%11 and %12Hammer%13 will synchronize their attacks with yours in an effort to catch the enemy off-guard.%14Intel indicates that Pegasus is likely to be in %15your AO%16 during the operation. Neutralizing him will disrupt their command structure and weaken their capacity to coordinate an effective defense. We will keep you updated on his position.
Key.Chinese: 偵察單位已確定，負責南部%1主要機場%2防禦網路的指揮官，其代號為"飛馬"。在我們突擊阿爾蒂斯島之前，我們必須先瓦解他們的防禦能力。%3為達此目的，四支小隊已經由海岸送入敵軍的領土上，其中包括你所屬的小隊，%"4Fox"%5，和一支負責撤離任務的小隊，%6"白嘴鴉"%7。你的任務是要在04:50時刻的主要攻擊前，摧毀敵軍在%8内奧霍里%9城市的防空陣地。%10"傑斯特"%11和%12"哈默"%13將同時同步攻擊這些放鬆警惕的敵軍。%14情報指出，"飛馬"即有可能在任務中出現在你的%15行動區域%16內。殲滅掉他，可以幫助我們瓦解敵方的防禦網路並讓他們的指揮陷入混亂。我們將隨時向你回報他的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察单位已确定，负责南部%1主要机场%2防御网络的指挥官，其代号为"飞马"。在我们突击阿尔蒂斯岛之前，我们必须先瓦解他们的防御能力。%3为达此目的，四支小队已经由海岸送入敌军的领土上，其中包括你所属的小队，%4"狐狸"%5，和一支负责撤离任务的小队，%6"白嘴鸦"%7。你们的任务是要在04:50时的主要攻击前，摧毁敌军在%8内奥霍里%9城的防空阵地。%10"杰斯特"%11和%12"哈默"%13将同时同步攻击这些放松警惕的敌军。%14情报指出，"飞马"极有可能在任务中出现在你的%15行动区域%16内。歼灭掉他，可以帮助我们瓦解敌方的防御网络并让他们的指挥陷入混乱。我们将随时向你回报他的位置。

Key.Original: Bishop - Operation lead.%1%2Fox%3 - Your team.%4%5Rook%6 - Extraction element.%7%8Jester%9 - Squad ambushing %10the naval base%11.%12%13Hammer%14 - Squad sabotaging %15the airfield%16.
Key.Chinese: "主教"-行動指揮官。%1%2"狐狸"%3-你的小隊。%4%5"白嘴鴉"%6-撤離單位。%7%8"傑斯特"%9-正在%10海軍基地%11附近埋伏的小隊。%12%13"哈默"%14-負責破壞%15機場%16的小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"-行动指挥官。%1%2"狐狸"%3-你的小队。%4%5"白嘴鸦"%6-撤离分队。%7%8"杰斯特"%9-正在%10海军基地%11附近埋伏的班。%12%13"哈默"%14-负责破坏%15机场%16的班。

Key.Original: Locate and destroy anti-aircraft positions in the vicinity of %1Neochori%2, withdraw to %3Rook's position%4, and exfil south. If the opportunity to neutralize Pegasus presents itself, take it.
Key.Chinese: 尋找並摧毀在%1内奧霍里%2城市的防空陣地，然後撤回%3"白嘴鴉"的位置%4並向南撤退。如果有機會殲滅"飛馬"，請好好把握。
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并摧毁在%1内奥霍里%2城内的防空阵地，然后撤回%3"白嘴鸦"的位置%4并向南撤退。如果有机会歼灭"飞马"，请好好把握。

Key.Original:
1. Regroup with %1the rest of your team%2.
2. Destroy the AA sites in %3Neochori%4.
3. Withdraw to %5Rook's position%6 and exfil.
Key.Chinese:
1. 與%1你剩下的隊員%2會合。
2. 摧毀%3内奧霍里%4城市的防空陣地。
3. 撤回%5"白嘴鴉"的位置%6並撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 与%1你剩下的队员%2会合。
2. 摧毁%3内奥霍里%4城内的防空阵地。
3. 撤回%5"白嘴鸦"的位置%6并撤退。

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Rook
Key.Chinese: 與"白嘴鴉"會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"白嘴鸦"会合

Key.Original: RENDEZVOUS
Key.Chinese: 重新集結
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新集结

Key.Original: Fall back to %1Rook%2's position and exfil south.
Key.Chinese: 撤回%1"白嘴鴉"的位置%2並向南撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤回%1"白嘴鸦"的位置%2并向南撤退。

Key.Original: Regroup
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Rendezvous with %1the rest of your team%2.
Key.Chinese: 與%1你剩下的隊員%2會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与%1你剩下的队员%2会合。

Key.Original: Neutralize Pegasus
Key.Chinese: 殲滅"飛馬"
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭"飞马"

Key.Original: If possible, eliminate Pegasus, the enemy commander stationed in %2Neochori%1, before he leaves the AO.
Key.Chinese: 假如有可能，趁著"飛馬"還留在%2内奧霍里%1的時候殲滅掉他。不要讓他離開行動區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如有可能，趁着"飞马"还留在%2内奥霍里%1的时候歼灭掉他。不要让他离开行动区域。

Key.Original: Destroy AA defenses
Key.Chinese: 摧毀防空陣地
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁防空阵地

Key.Original: Locate and destroy both AA defense systems located in %2Neochori%1.
Key.Chinese: 搜索並摧毀%2内奧霍里%1附近的所有防空陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索并摧毁%2内奥霍里%1附近的所有防空阵地。

Key.Original: Military airfield, southern Altis
Key.Chinese: 軍用機場，阿爾蒂斯南部
Key.Chinesesimp: 军用机场，阿尔蒂斯南部

Key.Original: 10 MINUTES LATER ...
Key.Chinese: 10分鐘過後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 10分钟过后...

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: GUNSHIPS - Attack Helicopters, Countermeasures, Huge Terrain
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:武裝直升機-攻擊直升機，對策分析，廣大的地圖
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示:武装直升机-攻击直升机，对策分析，广大的地图

Key.Original: Learn how to operate gunships in Arma 3. Repel the enemy assault with your heavily armed attack helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 學習如何操控武裝突襲3的武裝直升機。使用你全副武裝的直升機去擊退敵人的攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 学习如何操控武装突袭3的武装直升机。使用你全副武装的直升机去击退敌人的攻击。

Key.Original: PYRGOS RESUPPLY POINT
Key.Chinese: 皮爾戈斯補給點
Key.Chinesesimp: 皮尔戈斯补给点

Key.Original: Gunships
Key.Chinese: 武裝直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装直升机

Key.Original: Despite failing to save Viper-Green, you successfully completed all remaining objectives, striking a serious blow against enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: 儘管未能救出"毒蛇-綠"小隊，你仍然完成了其他的任務目標，並給我們敵人造成嚴重的打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管未能救出"毒蛇-绿"小组，你仍然完成了其他的任务目标，并给我们敌人造成严重的打击。

Key.Original: Flawless execution
Key.Chinese: 完美的勝利
Key.Chinesesimp: 完美的胜利

Key.Original: You completed all objectives and rescued Viper-Green. Enemy forces were beaten back and are retreating to their initial positions. Excellent work today, Hydra.
Key.Chinese: 你成功完成了所有的目標並救出"毒蛇-綠"小隊。敵軍已被擊退至他們的出發點。你今天實在表現的太棒了，"九頭蛇"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功完成了所有的目标并救出了"毒蛇-绿"。敌军已被击退至他们的出发点。你今天实在表现的太棒了，"九头蛇"。

Key.Original: Gunship is Out of Action!
Key.Chinese: 武裝直升機已不能運作!
Key.Chinesesimp: 武装直升机已不能运作!

Key.Original: Pyrgos is lost!
Key.Chinese: 失去皮爾戈斯!
Key.Chinesesimp: 皮尔戈斯陷落!

Key.Original: Missing in Action
Key.Chinese: 任務中失蹤
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务中失踪

Key.Original: Early this morning, enemy forces launched an all-out offensive against our southern positions. They managed to reach %1Panagia%2 before we were able to push them back to the island's capital, %3Pyrgos%4, and into the sea.%5However, our %6Pyrgos%7 forces report that the enemy has launched %8a swift counter-offensive%9 from %10their naval base%11. Friendly forces should be able to defend %12the city%13, but not for long. They need reinforcements as soon as possible.%14Our resources are stretched, but we need to hold the capital. Close Air Support will be a vital part of our defense.
Key.Chinese: 今天凌晨，敵軍對我們的南部發動了一個全面的攻擊。他們嘗試向%1帕納伊亞%2進軍，但卻被我們逼回首都%3皮爾戈斯%4，不久後就將他們打回海上。%5然而，我們在%6皮爾戈斯%7的部隊回報敵軍開始發動反擊。該部隊回報，敵軍正從他們的%10海軍基地%11向我們發動%8快速襲擊%9。友軍部隊應該能守住%12城市%13一陣子，但應該不能守住太久。他們現在很需要援軍的支援。%14我們的資源有限，但我們絕不能失去首都。密接空中支援將是這次防禦行動的主力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天凌晨，敌军对我们的南部发动了一次全面攻击。他们尝试向%1帕纳伊亚%2进军，但却被我们逼回首都%3皮尔戈斯%4，紧接着被赶下海。%5然而，我们在%6皮尔戈斯%7的部队报告称敌军开始发动反击。该部队回报，敌军正从他们的%10海军基地%11向我们发动%8快速袭击%9。友军部队应该能守住%12城市%13一阵子，但应该不能守住太久。他们现在很需要援军的支援。%14我们的资源有限，但我们绝不能失去首都。近距离空中支援将是这次防御行动的主力。

Key.Original: Griffin - HQ.%1%2Hydra%3 - Your team.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"-總部。%1%2"九頭蛇"%3-你的小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 狮鹫-总部。%1%2"九头蛇"%3-你的小队。

Key.Original: Link up with your Mi-48 gunner at %1our southern airfield%2, proceed to %3Pyrgos%4 and beat back %5the enemy counter-offensive%6.
Key.Chinese: 與你的米-48砲手在%1我們的南部機場%2會合，然後前往%3皮爾戈斯%4並擊退%5敵軍的攻擊%6。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与你的米-48炮手在%1我们的南部机场%2会合，然后前往%3皮尔戈斯%4并击退%5敌军的攻击%6。

Key.Original:
1. Board %1your Mi-48 Kajman.%2
2. Fly to %3Pyrgos%4.
3. Defeat %5the enemy counter-offensive%6.
Key.Chinese:
1. 登上%1你的米-48"鰐魚"。%2

Key.Original: %1Viper-Green%2 are in trouble. Divert immediately and extract them. LZ is hot.
Key.Chinese: %1"毒蛇-綠"%2正陷入麻煩之中。快速降落並撤離他們。降落點很危險。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1"毒蛇-绿"%2正陷入麻烦之中。赶快改变航向并撤出他们。降落点很危险。

Key.Chinese: 搜索並摧毀敵軍的火砲載具，它們正從%3西方的某個地方%4向%1皮爾戈斯%2開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索并摧毁敌军的炮兵平台，它们正从%3西方的某个地方%4向%1皮尔戈斯%2开火。

Key.Chinesesimp: 返回%1皮尔戈斯的直升机机场%2并降落。

Key.Chinesesimp: 假如有需要，你可以在%1皮尔戈斯的直升机机场%2降落并进行补给。

Key.Chinese: 飛到%1皮爾戈斯%2，並支援我們的部隊擊退%3敵軍的攻擊%4。
